Yesu kamuyangula, “Ngudeta myanja saba hela ha, ila milongu saba myanja milongu saba.
Ndi nongwa wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga wukwifwana na mutwa yumu yadayileyi tolitoli ya Vandumindumi vaki.
Pakandili kukawula, vamuyeghela mundu yumu yaveli na nongwa ya mbiya milongu alufu.
Mundoyu aveli kavahela cha kuhomba, Ponopa Bambu mundu kalayisha vamuhemeshi mweni na mdalamundu na vana na fyosi fyaveli nafyu, akahombi nongwa.
Topi, ayu ndumindumi katundama pawulongolu yaki, kadeta, ‘Umeti danguhombi nongwa yaku yosi.’
Yula Bambu kamuwonela lusungu, kampomela nongwa yila, kamuleka ayendi.”
“Lakini ndumindumi yula awukili, kamuwona yumu wa ndumindumi mumonga yaveli na nongwa yaki ya mbiya mya. Kamukamula kamukama pangulu kunu padeta, ‘Hombi mbiya shangu!’
Yula ndumindumi monga katundama, kamuluva, ‘Umeti danguhombi.’
Lakini mweni kalema, ila kamuwopa muchijaka mbaka pahomba yila nongwa.
Topi, vandumindumi vamonga pavawonili chilongu achi vang'ong'oteka munu, vayenda kumuwombela Bambu wawu chilongu chila chibwitukili.
Topi, yula Bambu kamukema yula ndumindumi kamuwombela, yuwi ndumindumi mwafu munu! Yuwi wanuvili na nenga ngupomela nongwa yaku yosi.
Na yuwi wungamuwonilili lusungu kucha nenga wungugolilili kwa ndumindumi muyaku?
Topi Bambu yula akalalili munu, kamufumisha yula ndumindumi alatuliwi mbaka pahomba nongwa yosi.”
Yesu kamalilila kwa kudeta, “Na Tati wangu yaveli kumbindi davagoleli nahawu kucha mundu pamupomela ng'odu mlongu mundu kwa moyu waki wosi.”
Yesu akamalili kudeta filongu fila, kawuka Galilaya, kayenda Yudeya kumwambu ya lweni Yoludani.
Vandu vatangalili vamukovikela, mweni kavalowola.
Mafwalisayu vamu vamwisilili, vamudasha kwa kumushengeta, “Wuli, malawu vetu vakujumisha mlumi kumleka mdala mundu kwanongwa yoyosi?”
Yesu kavayangula, “Wuli, musoma duhu Mumayandiku Vang'alili, kucha pakwandi Chapanga amulumbili mundu mlumi na mdala,
Chapanga adetili, ‘Kwa nongwa ayi mlulumi damuleki Tati waki na mawaki davayibavi na mdala mundu na veni davavi yumu?’
Ponopa, veni vavili kandi ha ila mundu yumu. Topi chavikili pamu Chapanga, mundu akotoo kuchilekanisha.”
Lakini Mafwalisayu vamudasha, “Nongwa liki Musa atulayishili kumleka mdala mbaka yiyandikiwi talaka ndi alekiwi?”
Yesu kavayangula, “Musa avajumishili kuvaleka vadala venu nongwa ndima shenu sidindala. Lakini yavelili nahawu ha Chapanga palumbeyi mlima.
Topi, nguvawombela, mundu yamleka mdala mundu na kumuheta wingi akali akagola uwoni, ila paamleka kwanongwa ya uwoni wa mdala yula.”
Vanachuli vaki vamuwombela, “Kucha milandu ya mlumi na mdala yiva naha, ngiba kuleka kuheta.”
Yesu kavawombela, “Vosi ha yivawesha kupokela chilongu achi, ila vala hela yavatangili Chapanga.
Nongwa kuna nongwa simu simugola mundu aleki kuheta, vamonga kwanongwa vawoneka nahawu na vamonga kwanongwa vagoliwa nahawu na vandu na vamonga vawona ngiba vakotoo kuheta kwanongwa ya wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga. Yawesha kupokela ng'ulilu ayi apokeli.”
Pambeli vandu vamuyeghela Yesu vana vadokwa avavikili mawoku na kuvadadavila kwa Chapanga. Lakini vanachuli vavalakalila.
Yesu kadeta, “Muvaleki vana ava vayisi kwa nenga, mukotoo kuvakana nongwa Wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga ndi wa vandu yivaveli kucha vana ava.”
Topi, kavavikila mawoku, pambeli kawuka.
Mundu yumu ayisili kwa Yesu, kamudasha, “Muwula, goli chindu liki chinofu ili ndiwupati unofu wa jola?”
Yesu kamuwombela, “Mbona ukudasha milandu ya nyanyi? Kuna yumu hela yaveli msangi. Pawudayila kwingila muunofu wa jola, koli Malawu va Chapanga.”
Yula mundu kamudasha, malawu voti? Yesu kadeta, “Kotoo kuwulagha, kotoo kugola uwoni, kotoo kuhija na kotoo kutovilela ufyangu,
vapikanishi tati waku na mawu waku na umutami mjofi mwawu ngimu witama umweni.”
Yula chijana kamuwombela, “Fyosi afi ndifikola: chamunu goli liki?”
Yesu kamuwombela, “Leki ukudayila kuva nyanyi, yendi kawuli mali shaku, mbiya dawusipati uvapi vagaju na yuwi dawuvi na lusanja kwa Chapanga pambeli wisi ungovikeli.”
Yula chijana papikanishili afi, kawuka kunu pang'ong'oteka, nongwa aveli mlundamali.
Topi Yesu kavawombela vanachuli vaki, “Nakaka nguvawombela, yidindala munu kwa mulundamali kwingila Muwutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga.
Kandi nguvawombela, yipusuka nendu kwa ndembu kwingila muchilanga cha sasiya, pitu mulundamali kwingila muwutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga,”
Vala vanachuli pavapikanishili nawula vajinga munu, vamudasha, “Leki yiva nahawu, ghani dalowoki?”
Yesu kavalola, kadeta, “kwa mundu fidindala, lakini kwa Chapanga findu fyosi fipusuka.”
Pambeli Petili kadeta, “Yufwi tufileka fyosi tukukovikela, datupati liki?”
Yesu kavawombela, “Nguvawombela nakaka mwana wa mundu payikala muchigoda cha wutwa wa muukomi, yumwi lilongu na vavili yimungovikela damwikali mufigoda pamuvahigha makabila lilongu na vavili va Isilaeli.
Na mundu yayilekili nyumba, mlongu awu muhaja, tati awu mawu, vana awu fitava kwanongwa ya nenga, dapokeli myanja mya na nendu, dapati na unofu wa jola.
Lakini yivaveli vakwaa davavi kumbeli na yivavelili kumbeli davavi vakwaa.
“Wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga wifwana nga mundu yumu munachitava cha misabibu, yavelili kafuma pamalavila puti kuvavika vagolafichuku va muchitava chaki.
Awombanili nawu kuvahomba mbiya ijala ya lijuva limu, pambeli kavayegha muchitava chaki cha misabibu.
Kawuka kandi saa tatu pamalavila, kavawona vandu vamonga vawoloka kusoku, vavahela chichuku cha kugola.
Kavawombela, ‘muyendi kuchitava changu cha misabibu mukagoli chichuku, nenga dandivahombi ijala yenu.’
Topi, vayenda. Yula munachitava kawuka kandi saa sita pamusi na saa tisa kagola nga wuwula wula.
Hata payifikili saa lilongu na limu palumihi, kawuka kandi, kavawona vandu vamonga vawoloka pala pasoku. Topi, kavadasha, ‘Mbona muwoloka apa pamusi posi ngajila kugola chichuku?’
Vamuyangula, ‘Kwa nongwa kwahela mundu yatukemili tukagoli chichuku, mweni kavawombela na yumwi muyendi mukagoli chichuku cha muchitava changu cha misabibu.’
“Lijuva palihongili yula munachitava kamuwombela mkola mbiya waki, vakemi vagola chichuku uvahombi ijala yawu, ‘Ukandi na vala vafikili kumbeli, pambeli umalishili na vala vakwaa.’
Topi, vayisa vala yivayisili saa lilongu na limu vapokela kila mundu ijala ya lijuva limu.
Vala va kwaa kufika pavafikili, vakacheyi davapokeli sitangalili, lakini veni vapata ngimu wuwula wula kila mundu ijala ya lijuva limu.
Vasipokela mbiya shawu, vakanda kumung'ong'utekela yula bambu.
Vadeta, ‘Ava vafikili kumbeli vagola chichuku cha kwa lisaa limu hela. Mbona kutugolela tulinganili na veni kunu yufwi twiwunishila tugola chichuku chikomi na lijuva likali lituyakila?’
“Topi yula bambu kamuyangula yula muyawu yumu, ‘pikanishi ghanja, ngubanja chindu ng'odu! Twawombanili ng'odu na nenga, kucha ndivahombi ijala ya lijuva limu?
Toli ijala yaku, yendi, ngudayila kumupa ayu wa kumbeli mulinganili na yuwi.
Ndivahela haki ya kugola mali shangu ngimu wudayila ndimweni? Wuli, ukuwona weyi kwanongwa nenga ndiva msangi?’ ”
Yesu kamalilila kwa kudeta, “Ndi dayivi nahawu, yivavelili kumbeli ponopa davavi vakwaa na vakwaa davavi va kumbeli pambeli.”
Yesu paghaveyi akuyenda kumbindi Yelusalemu, avatolili vala vanachuli lilongu na vavili pachifisu na paghaveyi mudeha kavawombela,
“Mpikanishi! Tukuyenda Yelusalemu na aku Mwana wa Mundu davamuhadishi kwa mtambika mkomi na vawula va Malawu, veni davamuhighi awulayiwi kwa kumuvangilila mulupingika.
Davamuhadishi kwa vandu vangajila kumumanya Chapanga ili vamudanili, dalatuliwi ndomondu na kuvangiliwa mulupingika, lakini lijuva lya tatu kukandila pasovili, dashukushiwi.”
Mdala wa Sebidayu amwisilili Yesu pamu na vana vaki, katundama pawulongolu yaki kumuluva chindu.
Yesu kamudasha, “Chiwudayila liki?” Mawu yula kamuwombela, “Ngukuluva undangi muwutwa waku, ava vana vangu vavili vayikali yumu mwambu waku wa mlilu na wingi mwambu waku wa mkiyi.”
Yesu kamuyangula, “Mumanya ha kucha mukuluva chindu liki. Mukuwesha kulandila lwindi lwa ndeshiwu danandili nenga?” Vamuyangula, “Tukuwesha.”
Yesu kavawombela, “Nakaka damulandili lwindi lunandila nenga, lakini kwikala kumulilu awu kumukiyi chichuku cha ya nenga ha, chindu achi davapati vala yivashawuliwili kala na Tati wangu.”
Vala vanachuli vamonga lilongu pavapikanishili afi, vavalakalila vala valongu vavili.
Yesu kavakema, kavawombela, “Mumanya kucha vatavala va vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi vakutavala vandu vawu kwa mawovi na vakomi vala vakuvatavala vandu vawu.
Lakini kwa yumwi yikotoo kuva nahawu, ila yadayila kuva mkomi gati ya yumwi ghavi ndumindumi wa vosi,
na yadayila kuva wa kwaa gati ya yumwi ghavi ndumindumi wa yumwi.
Ndambu yiyeyi, Mwana wa Mundu kayisa kukimbanikiwa ha, ila kukimbanika na kutawula unofu waki kuva badili ya vandu vatangalili.”
Yesu paghaveyi akuwuka mbwani ya Yeliku, lipinga lya vandu lyamukovikelili.
Topi kwavelili na vangalimesu vavili vayikalili mumbalimbali ya deha, pavapikanishili kucha Yesu akupita pala, valandushili lishu, “Bambu, mwana wa Dawudi, wutuwoneli lusungu!”
Lila lipinga lya vandu livalakalila na kuvawombela vanyamali. Lakini veni valandusha nendu lishu, “Bambu mwana wa Dawudi, wutuwoneli lusungu!”
Yesu kawoloka, kavakema na kuvadasha, “Mukudayila ndivagoleli liki?”
Vamuyangula, “Bambu, tukuluva tuloli.”
Topi, Yesu kavawonela lusungu, kavagufya mesu vawu na tepu vawesha kulola, pambeli vamukovikela.
Yesu na vanachuli vaki pavaveghi samba vafika Yelusalemu, vafikili tanila Betifage mufidunda fya miseyituni. Pala Yesu avalayishili vanachuli vaki vavili,
kavawombela, “Muyendi mbaka chijiji chiveli pawulongolu yenu damumuwoni chihongu vamuwopa pamu na ngwada waki. Muvawoposoli munyegheli.
Leki mundu pavadasha nongwa liki mukumuwopusola, mumuwombeli Bambu akumudayila na tepu mweni davawuyishili.”
Chilongu achi chagolili ili fila fidetiwili na mbuyi fivi.
“Muyiwombeli mbwani ya Sayuni, Loli, Mutwa waku akwisila! Kava mshishamoyu na kayipakila chihongu, ngwada wa chihongu, mwana wa chihongu.”
Vala vanachuli vayenda vagola ngimu Yesu wavalayililili.
Vamuyegha yula chihongu pamu na mwana waki, vayala yingwa shawu kumuwongu ya vachihongwi na Yesu kayipaka kumuwongu yaki.
Lipinga lya vandu vayala yingwa shawu mudeha na vandu vamonga vatemula miputila ya mibiki vayala mumbali mbali ya deha kumulibushila.
Mipinga ya vandu valongulili na vala vamukovikela valandusha lishu, “Ajumiwi Mwana wa Dawudi! Anemiliwi ayu yayisa kwa litawa lya Bambu! Ajumiwi Chapanga kumbindi!”
Yesu paghaveyi akwingila Yelusalemu, mbwani yosi yimema njova. Vandu vakadasheyi, “Ayu ghani?”
Vandu mulipinga lila vadeta, “Ayu ndi Yesu, mbuyi wa Chapanga kafuma Nasaleti mkowa wa Galilaya.”
Topi, Yesu kayingila munyumba ya Chapanga, kavavingila panji vandu yivavelili vakuchuusa na kuhemela findu mugati ya nyumba ya Chapanga, kasibidula mesa sha vala yivaveyi vakufunja mbiya na figoda fya vala yivavelili vakuwula vanjiva.
Kavawombela, “Yiyandikiwa Mumayandiku Mang'alili, Chapanga kadeta, ‘Nyumba ya nenga yikukemiwa nyumba ya kudadavila.’ Lakini yumwi mupagola kuva mbaku ya vefi na vapoki.”
Vangalimesu na vakwavakwava vamonga vamuyendilili aku kunyumba Ngomi ya Chapanga, Yesu kavalowola.
Topi, vatambika vakomi na vawula va Malawu vakalala pavayiwonili miwujawuja yagolili Yesu na vana pavaveghi vakulandula mashu vawu nyumba ya Chapanga pavadeta, “Lujumu kwa mwana wa Dawudi.”
Topi, vamuwombela, “Kupikana ng'odu chivadeta?” Yesu kavayangula, “Yina ngupikana! Wuli musoma duhu mayandiku ava? ‘Kwa milomu ya vana vadokwa na fyali, ukwipatila jumu yeni.’ ”
Topi, kavaleka kafuma panji ya mbwani na kuyenda Betaniya, aku kawonja.
Pamavavila puti Yesu paghaveyi akuwuya kumbwani, katopa njala,
kaliwona libiki limu mumbalimbali ya deha kaliyendela lakini kaliwona livahela chindu ila mihamba weka. Topi, kaliwombela, “Kotoo kulela fivelekwa kandi jola!” Bahala pala libiki lila linyala.
Vanachuli pavawonili nawula vajinga, vadeta, “Nongwa liki libiki ali linyala kalopu?”
Yesu kavayangula, “Nakaka nguvawombela, leki pamuva na ujumilwa ngajila hoshu, mukuwesha kugola nahawu. Wekahela ha, ila hata pamuchiwombela chidunda achi ‘Tupuki kayilyasili mubahali,’ dachigoleki nahawu.
Pamuva na ujumilwa, chochosi damuluvi kwa kudadava damupati.”
Yesu kayingila munyumba ya Chapanga, akawuleyi. Pawuleyi mtambika mkomi na vavaha va vandu vamonga vamudasha, “Ukugola findu afi kwa uwesu wa ghani? Ghani yakupili uwesu awu?”
Yesu kavayangula, “Na nenga nguvadasha chindu chimu, Pamunyangula na nenga dandivawombeli ngugola findu afi kwa uwesu wa ghani.
Mung'ombeli uwesu wa Yohani mbatisha wafumili kwa ghani? Wafumili kwa Chapanga awu kwa vandu?” Lakini vawombana veni kwa veni naha, “Patudeta wafumili kumbindi daatudashi, ‘Mbona mwamjumilili ng'odu?’
Na patudeta, ‘Wafumili kwa vandu,’ tukutila lipinga lya vandu nongwa vosi vakujumila kucha Yohani mbatisha aveli mbuyi wa Chapanga.”
Topi, vamuyangula, “Tumanya ha.” Na Yesu kavawombela, “Na nenga dandivawombeli ha ngugola findu afi kwa uwesu wa ghani.
“Yumwi mwikwihola wuliwuli chilongu achi, Mundu yumu yaveli na vana vavili. Kamuwombela yula wa kwaa, ‘Mwana wangu nalelu yendi kagoli chichuku cha muchitava cha misabibu.’
Yula msongolu kamuwombela ‘Nema!’ Lakini pambeli kaghalambula natilu, kayenda kugola chichuku.
Yula tati kamuwombela mwana waki wingi wuwowu, mweni kamuyangula ‘Yina tati nguyenda!’ Lakini kayenda kuchichuku ha.
Ponopa ghani gati ya ava vavili yagolili fyadayila tati waki?” Vamuyangula, “Yula mwana soli.” Topi, Yesu kavawombela, “Nakaka nguvawombela, yumwi mukali hela kwingila Muwutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga, vasumula mbiya na vawoni davatali kwingila.
Kwa nongwa Yohani mbatisha ayisili kwa yumwi kuvalangusha ya ugoleki ya kwikala, yumwi mumujumila ha. Lakini vasumula mbiya na vawoni vamujumila. Hata pamufiwonili afi fyosi yumwi mupomela na kujumila ha.”
Yesu kadeta, “Mpikanishi chilangushilu chingi. Mundu yumu muna nyumba alimili chitava cha misabibu, kachishengiteshela luviwu, pambeli kakumba lyowu lya kukamila misabibu, kajenga lidimililu. Pambeli kalihadika kwa valimi, mweni kawuka kayenda mwanja mtali mlima wingi.
Pachifikili chipindi cha kubena, avalayishili Vandumindumi vaki kwa vala valimi, ili vakatoli fimu fya fila fivabenili valimi.
Vala valimi vavakamula vala vandumindumi vamu vamutovanga na wingi vamuwulagha na yula wa tatu vamutovanga na miganga.
Mundu yula kavalayisha Vandumindumi vengi vatangalili kupita vala va mwanja mtasi. Vala valimi vavagola nga wuwula.
Pambeli kamulayisha mwana waki kunu payihola kucha, ‘Davamtili mwana wangu.’
Lakini vala valimi pavamuwonili mwana waki vawombana veni kwa veni, ‘Ayu ndi muhala mbala. Tumuwulayi ili tutoli mbala yaki!’
Topi vamukamula, vamukweghela panji ya chitava chila cha misabibu, vamuwulagha!”
Yesu kavadasha, “Ponopa yula muna chitava cha misabibu payisa davagoli liki vala valimi?”
Veni vamuyangula, “Davawulaghi vala vandu vawafu na chitava chila davapi valimi vengi na pambeli vala valimi davamupi fimu fya fila fyavabena.”
Yesu kavadasha, “Musoma duhu chindu achi mumayandiku vang'alili? Ligonguveli lya kujengela livalemili vajengi, ponopa liva ligonguveli likomi lya chikandilu. Bambu ndi yagolili chilongu achi, na chiva cha chiloja munu kwa yufwi!”
Yesu kayendelela kudeta, “Ponopa nguvawombela, wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga dawuwushiwi kwa yumwi na kuvapa vangajila kumumanya Chapanga na yivagola fyadayila Chapanga.
Yaponikela pa ligonguveli ali dabenekibeneki na yula dalimponikeli dabajangiki.”
Vatambika vakomi na Mafwalisayu pavapikanishili afi filangushilu fyaki vamanyili kucha aveli akuvadeta veni.
Ponopa vakasakeyi deha ya kumvakula vamuwopi, lakini vatilili vandu kwanongwa veni vamumanyili mweni mbuyi wa Chapanga.
Yesu adetili nawu kandi kwa chilangushilu,
“Wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga wifwana na Mutwa yamtandili mwana waki mlumi lihungu lya kuheta.
Topi, kavakema Vandumindumi vaki kavalayisha, mukavalaliki vandu vayisi muhalusi, lakini yivalalikiwili valema kwisa.
Kavalayisha kandi Vandumindumi vamonga, kadeta, mukavawombeli vala vandivalalikili. ‘Lihungu lyangu liva kala, senga wangu yanunili kasinjiwa kala, kila chindu chiva kala, mwisi kulihungu!’
Lakini veni vatinuka ha, vayenda, yumu kuchitava chaki na wingi kayenda kufichuku fyaki,
na vamonga vavakamula vala Vandumindumi vavajowola na kuvawulagha.
Yula mutwa kakalala, kavalayila vamachonda vaki vakavamalili vala vavawulayili vayawu na kubohola mbwani yawu.
Pambeli kavawombela Vandumindumi vaki, ‘Lihungu liva kala, lakini valalikiwa vangajila kulatiwa.
Topi, muyendi kunjila mukavawombeli vandu vovosi vala, mukavayeghi vayisi kulihungu.’
Vala Vandumindumi vawuka, vayenda kunjila, vavayegha vandu vosi, vawafu na vanofu. Mbaka nyumba ya vahenja yamemili,
“Mutwa payingilili kavalola vahenja, kamuwona mundu yumu yafwalili ng'odu yingwa ya lihungu.
Mutwa kamudasha, ‘Ghanja kwingila wuliwuli apa ngajila yingwa ya lihungu?’ Lakini mweni kayikala jii.
Topi, mutwa kavawombela vandumindumi vaki, ‘Mumuwopi mawulu na mawoku mukamuyasi panji muchisi, aku dalili na kugelujula minu,’”
Yesu kamalilila kwa kudeta, “Valalikiwili vatangala, ila vadokwa yivashawuliwili.”
Mafwalisayu vayenda, vawombana ndambu ya kumuwomesha Yesu kwa filongu fyaki.
Pambeli, vavalayisha Vandundami wawu pamu na Vandundami va lipinga lya Helodi vamudasha, “Muwula, tukumanya kucha yuwi kuva mundu wa nakaka na ukuwula nakaka deha ya Chapanga kwa ugoleki, ukumtila mundu yoyosi ha, kwanongwa ukomi wa mundu kwa yuwi chindu ha.
Ponopa wutuwombeli chiwihola, yiva nyanyi awu ng'odu kuhomba kodi kwa Mutwa wa Loma?”
Lakini Yesu amanyili kala milandu yawu ya wafu, kavawombela, “Yumwi muvafyangu mbona mukunyesha?
Munangushi mbiya ya kuhombela kodi.” Vamulangusha ligwala lya mbiya.
Topi, Yesu kavadasha, “Wushu na lihundu ali lya ghani?”
Vamuyangula, “Mutwa wa Loma.” Yesu kavawombela, “Nyanyi, fya Mutwa wa Loma mumupi Mutwa wa Loma na fya Chapanga mumupi Chapanga.”
Pavapikanishili naha vayikanganika, vamuleka, veni vayenda.
Lijuva lila, Masadukayu vamu vadeta, yivasovili vakushukuka ng'odu. Vamu vamwisila Yesu vamuwombela,
“Muwula, Musa adetili mdala pasova mbendi, yula ngalimlyangu ahaliwi na mlongumundu, ili amuleleli vana mlongumundu.
Topi, pavelili na valongu saba. Soli ahetili pambeli kasova mbendi, kahaliwa kandi na mlongu wingi.
Yiva wuwowu hata kwa mlongu wingi wa tatu, mbaka mlongu wa saba.
Pavasovili valongu vosi na yula ngalimlyangu asovili wuwowu.
Ponopa lijuva pavashukuka vala yivasovili daghavi mdala wa ghani? Kwa vala valumi saba yivasovili? Kwa nongwa vosi saba vamutolili.”
Yesu kavayangula, “Yumwi muvifya kwanongwa mumanya ha Mayandiku Vang'alili wala liwovi lya Chapanga.
Nongwa yivasovili pavashukuka davaheti ha wala kuhetiwa, davavi kucha Makungu wa Chapanga.
Lakini kwilata kushukuka yivasovili, wuli, musoma ng'odu fila fyavawombilili Chapanga?
Chapanga kadeta, ‘Nenga ndiva Chapanga wa Ibulahimu na Chapanga wa Isaka na Chapanga wa Yakobi!’ Topi mweni Chapanga wa yivasovili ha ila ndi Chapanga wa yivaveli vanofu.”
Lila lipinga lya vandu pavapikanishili naha liyikang'anika ng'ulilu yaki.
Mafwalisayu pavapikanishili kucha Masadukayu vavahela chilongu chingi cha kumdasha Yesu, vayikungulili pamu.
Muyawu yumu aveli mundu wa Malawu, ayeshili kumdasha Yesu kwa kumuyesha.
Amudashili, “Muwula, amuli liki yiveli ngomi munu pitu shosi mumalawu?”
Yesu kavayangula, “Mtami Bambu Chapanga waku kwa ndima yaku yosi na kwa fuki yaku na kwa luhala lwaku losi:
Ali ndi lilawu likomi na lyakwaa.
Ya pili yikwifwana na ayi, ‘Mtami mjofi waku kucha witama umweni.’
Malawu vosi va Musa na mayandiku va vambuyi va Chapanga vakwiyidumbila Malawu mavili ava.”
Mafwalisayu pavayikungili pamu, Yesu avadashili,
“Yumwi mukuwona wuliwuli chilongu achi chimwilata Kilistu Mkombola? Wuli, kava mwana wa lukolu liki?” Vamuyangula, “Wa lukolu lwa Dawudi.”
Yesu kavawombela, “Topi, yikuva wuliwuli kucha kwa liwovi lya Mfuki Mng'alili Dawudi akumkema mweni Bambu? Kwa nongwa adetili.
‘Bambu amuwombilili Bambu wangu, Wuyikali mwabu wanenga wa mlilu: mbaka ndivaviki mangandawu vaku pasi ya mawulu vaku.’
Topi, leki Dawudi akumkema Mkombola Bambu, yikuva wuliwuli Mkombola ghavi mwana wa Dawudi?”
Kwa hela mundu yoyosi yaweshili kumuyangula chilongu. Na kukandila lijuva lililalila kwa hela yagelili kumudasha chindu.
Pambeli Yesu kaliwombela lipinga lya vandu pamu na vanachuli vaki,
Kadeta, “Vawula va Malawu na Mafwalisayu vana uwesu wa kudeta kwanongwa Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa.
Ponopa mukamuli na kugola chochosi chadayila kavawombela. Lakini mukotoo kutapula fila fyavagolili, kwanongwa vakugola ha fila fivalandula.
Vakuwopa misiwu misitu na kuvatwika vandu mumakombi, lakini veni vakulema hata kuyesha kupapa padiki.
Veni vakugola findu ili vandu vavajumi. Vakufwala viniku sivelili na mayandiku va Malawu pawushu na mumawoku yawu. Na vakufwala mihabiti yawu yivelili na miviniku mikomi.
Vakudayila fwasi nofu mulihungu na kwikala mufigoda fya hishima munyumba sha kudadavila.
Vakudayila kujambushiwa kwa ndundamilu musoku na vakudayila kukemiwa na vandu, ‘muwula’
Lakini yumwi mukotoo kukemiwa ‘muwula,’ kwanongwa muwula wenu yumu hela na mwavosi yumwi muva munyumba yimu.
Wala mukotoo kumukema mundu yoyosi ‘Tati’ pa mlima awu kwanongwa Tati wenu yumu hela, yaveli kumbindi.
Wuwula wula mukotoo kukemiwa ‘fiwongosi,’ kwanongwa chiwongosi wenu yumu hela, Kilistu Mkombola.
Yaveli mkomi kwa yumwi ndi ghavi ndumindumi wa yumwi.
Yaitutumula dapohomushiwi na yaipohumosha datutumuliwi na Chapanga.”
“Pishu, yumwi vawula va Malawu na Mafwalisayu, vafyangu! Mukuvatatila vandu mlyangu wa wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga. Na mwaveni mukwingila ha mugati, wala mukuvayingisha ha vandu yivadayila kwingila vayingili.
Pishu, yumwi vawula va Malawu na Mafwalisayu, yumwi mukuvapughapugha vangalimlyangu na kutola findu fyawu na kudadava ngumbilu ndali ili kuyilangusha kwa vandu. Kwa nongwa ayi asabu yenu dayivi ngomi nendu.
“Pishu, yumwi vawula va Malawu na Mafwalisayu, yumwi vafyangu! Mukutyanga kujabuka bahali na milima yitangalili ili muweshi kumughalambula mundu ajumili kucha wumujumila yumwi. Pamupata mukuwesha kumgola mwana ayendi mumotu wa lifumbika nendu pitu yumwi.
“Pishu yumwi fiwongosi ngalimesu! Yumwi mukudeta, ‘Kucha, mundu payilapa kwa nyumba ya Chapanga, malapu ava chindu ha, Lakini payilapa kwanongwa chumang'andu ya nyumba ya Chapanga, malapu ava vakumkamula.’
Yumwi ngalimesu vapufi! Choti chitawukili nendu, Chumang'andu awu nyumba ya Chapanga yiigola ayi chumang'andu kuva ying'alili?
Kandi mukuvawula, ‘Kucha, mundu payilapa pa fyalu pa kutambikila chindu ha, lakini payilapa kwa fupu yivikiwili pambindi ya fyalu pa kutambikila, malapu vala vakumukamula,’
Yumwi ngalimesu! Choti chiveli na mana munu, Yila fupu awu pala fyalu, paligoliwa litambiku livi ling'alili?
Mundu yayilapa kwa mahali pa kutambikila litambiku, kayilapa kwa mahali pa fyalu na kwa chochosi chivikiwili pambindi yaki.
Na yailapa kwa nyumba ya Chapanga, kayilapa kwa yila Nyumba ya kudadavila na wuwula wula kwa Chapanga yula yayikala mugati.
Na yailapa kwa kumbindi kwa Chapanga, kayilapa kwa chigoda cha wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga na kwa Chapanga yula yayikalilili chigoda achi.
“Pishu yumwi vawula va Malawu na Mafwalisayu, vafyangu! Vakumugayila Chapanga chindu chimu kwa kila findu lilongu, hata kwa mihamba yiveli na nyambulilu nofu, myaya na mingwema, kunu mukufileka findu fiveli fitalama fya Malawu kucha kugola fyadayila Chapanga, haki na lusungu na ujumilwa findu afi fitawuka mukudayiliwa kufigola ngajila kuyivasuwa fila fimonga.
Fiwongosi ngalimesu! Mukujabula chindu chidokwa kucha vangosi mufindu fya kulandila, lakini mukumila findu fikomi kucha ndembu!
“Pishu yumwi vawula va Malawu na Mafwalisayu, vafyangu! Mukung'ofuwa lwindi na bakuli kwa panji, lakini mugati mukukuleka mumema findu mufipatili kwa njila ya kuvapoka na ubafu.
Mafwalisayu ngalimesu! Hofuwi lwindi mugati tanila na panji dakuvi nyanyi wuwowu.
“Pishu yumwi vawula va Malawu na Mafwalisayu, vafyangu! Muva kucha sembi. Sivashaghishili kwa panji sikuwoneka kuva nyanyi, lakini mgati mumema mipava ya chikongu na ndambu ya wafu.
Wuwowu yumwi mukuwoneka kwa vandu kwa panji muva vasangi, lakini kwa mugati mumema ufyangu na wafu.
“Pishu yumwi vawula va Malawu na Mafwalisayu, vafyangu! Mukujenga sembi sha vambuyi na kumelimetesha sembi sha vandu goleki.
Mukudeta kucha yufwi tungaveli chipindi cha vavaha vetu tungaveli pamu ha kuvawulagha vambuyi!
Ponopa mukutovilela mwaveni baha kucha muva vana va vandu vavawulayi vambuyi.
Topi, ponopa mugolikeshi chichuku yila yivakandili vavaha venu!
Yumwi njoka yaveli na usungu! Mukuwesha wuliwuli kwilyepa kuhighilu ya motu wa lifumbika?
Ndi nongwa nenga nguvayeghela mbuyi, vandu yivaveli na luhunja na vawula va Malawu, damuvawulayi na kumvangilila mulupingika vamonga vamu na vamonga damuvalatuli na fiboku munyumba ya kudadavila yenu na kuvasaka mbwani shosi.
Topi, mbatiwa yosi dayivapati kwanongwa ya mwasi wosi wa vandu goleki wumwayikili muuganga, yina kukandila kumwayika kwa mwasi wa Abeli yaveli ngajila nongwa mbaka yila ya Sakaliya mwana wa Balakiya, yimumuwulayili munyumba ya Chapanga muchumba gati ya pang'alili na pafyalu.
Nguvawombela nakaka, chileli achi dachipati asabu kwanongwa ya njifwa asi.
“Yelusalemu! Deku Yelusalemu! Ukuvawulaya Vambuyi na kuvatovanga miganga vala valayishiwili kwa yuwi. Kaningi nyesha kuvakunga vana vaku kwa nenga kucha wula nguku pakunga vana vaki mwifungu ya mbapatilu shaki, lakini mulema.
Topi loli, nyumba yaku Chapanga dayilekiwi domoo!
Ngukuwombela, dawung'oni kandi ha mbaka pawudeta: ‘Anemiliwi ayu yayisayu kwa litawa lya Bambu.’ ”
Yesu kafuma Munyumba ya Chapanga na paghaveyi akuyenda, vanachuli vaki vamuyendilili, vamulangusha ndambu yivamelimetishili kwa migonguveli ya nyanyi.
Yesu kavawombela, “Yina, mukuwesha kusilola asi shosi! Nakaka nguvawombela, kwahela hata ligonguveli limu dalisighali kumbindi ya ligonguveli limonga, kila chindu dachibowuliwi.”
Yesu paghaveyi kayikala pachidunda cha Miseyituni, vanachuli vamuyendilili pachisikafu, vamudasha, “Tuwombeli, findu afi dafivi ndili? Dachilangushiwi chilangushilu liki kwisa kwa yuwi na mwishu wa chipindi?”
Yesu kavayangula, “Muyivavali, mukotoo kujangiwa na mundu.
Kwanongwa davabwituki vandu vatangalili vakwisa, pavadeta kucha, ‘mweni ndi Kilistu Mkombola!’ Na veni davavayushi vandu vatangalili.
Damupikanishi lupwepu lwa ngondu pabehi na kutali, lakini mukotoo kutila, kwanongwa afi dafibwituki, lakini mwishu weni wakali.
Vandu va mlima wumu dawulevi na mlima wingi, wutwa wumu dawulevi na wutwa wingi. Kosi dakuvi na njala na liyighayigha mlima wonda.
Fyosi afi ndalishu hela kucha matami chipindi chakulela mwana.
“Pambeli davavatawuli ili mugobuliwi na kuwulayiwa. Vandu va milima yosi dayivanyekwi kwanongwa ya nenga.
Vatangalili davayileki ujumilwa wawu, davayivifyi na kuyinyekwa veni kwa veni.
Davabwituki vambuyi va udesi vatangalili davavayaghamishi vandu vatangalili,
kwanongwa ya kuyongisheka filongu fya wafu, vandu davayitami nendu ha.
Lakini mundu yayiwunishila mbaka kumbelu ayu ndi dalowuliwi.
Ila mwishu wukali hela kufika, achi chilongu cha nyanyi cha wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga dachilanduliwi mlima wosi kucha utovileli kwa vandu kufuma makabila vosi vangajila kumumanya Chapanga.
“Topi, pamuwona chindu cha wafu chikuwesha kuvifya Nyumba Ngomi ya Chapanga, manyi yula yadetiwili na Mbuyi wa Chapanga Daniyeli pawolushiwa mahali pang'alili. Mundu yasoma amanyi mana yaki.
Topi, yivaveli Yudeya vatuvilili kufidunda.”
Na yaveli palipaghali akotoo kusunuka kutola chindu munyumba yaki.
Yaveli kufitava akotoo kuwuya kumbeli kutola yingwa yaki.
Pishu, kwa vadadala yivaveli na ndumbu na yivayongesha majuva va mbelu!
Mudadavi ili nduvilu yenu yikotoo kuva lijuva lya lupepu awu lijuva lya kupumulila!
Mana chipindi achi dachivi na siki ngomi yingajila kuwoneka kukandila kulumbiwa kwa mlimawu mbaka nalelu, wala dayibwituki kandi ha.
Leki majuva ava yangayangishiwili ng'odu, kwahela mundu yoyosi angalowuliwili, lakini majuva ava davayangishiwi na Chapanga kwanongwa ya vala yivashawuliwili.
“Topi, kwa majuva vesava mundu pavawombela: ‘Kilistu Mkombola kava apa’ awu ‘kava pala,’ Mkotoo kujumila.
Kwa nongwa davabwituki va Kilistu va ufyangu na Vambuyi va udesi na davagoli chilangushilu chikomi na mihilu ya kuwesha kuvayaghamisha, yikuweshikana hata kwa vala vashawuliwili na Chapanga.
Mpikanishi, yumwi ndavakayikili kala.
“Topi, pavavawombela, ‘Muloli, kava kucheja, mukotoo kuyenda aku’ awu pavavawombela, ‘Kayififa munyumba, mukotoo kujumila.’
Kwa nongwa kucha lumuli palung'alika kufuma kundamba mbaka kuuhehi, ndi dayivi kwisa kwa mwana wa mundu.
“Pala pawuvelili mtugulu, vandapu vakwikungasha baha.”
Kalopu payiveyi siki majuva vala, dakuvi na chisi wuluwulu na limbalamwesi daliloleki ha, ndondwa dasiponeki kufuma kumbindi kululanga na liwovi lya kumbindi dalitikanyishwi.
Pambeli, chilangushilu cha mwana wa Mundu dachiwoneki kululanga na makabila vosi va mlimawu davawuti, davamuwoni Mwana wa Mundu payisa kumbindi ya mafundi va kululanga na liwovi na ukomi utangalili.
Mweni davalayishi Makungu vaki yivaveli na limbalapi lya kulamika munu davakungashi vashawuliwili kufuma mbembu shosi mchechi sha mlimawu, kufuma mwishu awu wa lulanga mbaka mwishu wingi.
“Kwa likuyu muyiwuli chilangushilu awu: Tepu mitafyi yaki payikanda kuva miteki na kuyalula mukumanya kucha ndonya ya pabehi.
Wuwowu yumwi pamuwona findu afi fyosi pafigoleka, mumanyi kucha Mwana wa Mundu samba ayisi.
Nguvawombela nakaka, chileli achi chipiti ng'odu ngajila filongu fyosi afi kugoleka.
Lulanga na mlima dafipiti, lakini filongu fyangu dafipiti ng'odu.”
“Liyilata lijuva awu saa, kwahela mundu yamanyili kucha dayivi ndili, wala Makungu va kumbindi kwa Chapanga, wala Mwana, ila Tati weka yaki ndi yamanyili.
Kucha payiveyi chipindi cha Nuhu, nga wuwula wula dayivi kwisa kwa Mwana wa Mundu.
Nongwa chipindechi, lilava likomi lya njifwa likali hela, vandu vaveli vakulya na kulanda, pavaheta na kuhetiwa, mbaka Nuhu payingilili muwula watu mkomi wuvawukema Safina.
Vamanyili ha kucha kuna liki mbaka chila lilawa likomi lya njifwa palibwitukili, likuvawona vosi. Ayi dayivi hata chipindi Mwana wa mundu payisa.
Chipindechi vandu vavili davavi kufitava: Yumu datoliwi na monga dalekiwi.
Vadadala vavili davavi vakulibula majani, yumu datoliwi na monga dalekiwi.
“Topi, mugungi mesu, kwanongwa mulimanya ha lijuva Bambu wenu dayisi.
Lakini muyiholi chilongu achi! Kucha muna nyumba angamanyili lijuva lyafika mwifi, angagungili mesu, angayilekili ha nyumba yaki vabowoli.
Ponopa yumwi muvi ndemindemi, kwanongwa Mwana wa Mundu dayisi chipindi mungajila kuchimanya”.
Yesu kayendelela kudeta, “Topi, ndi ndumindumi goleki na yaveli na luhunja, Bambu mundu daamuviki pambindi ya vandu vaki na kumuwombela avapi filivi fyawu kwa chipindi cheni?
Ngiba yula ndumindumi Bambu mundu payisa damuwoni pagola chichuku cha yila.
Nguvawombela nakaka, damuviki ndumindumi ayu awolukeli mali vaki vosi.
Leki kucha Vandumindumi yangajila goleki payidetela mundima, ‘Bambu wangu kakelwa kuwuya,
pambeli akukanda kuvatova vandumindumi vamonga na kukanda kulya na kulanda pamu na vanjayila.’
Topi, Bambu mundu payisa lijuva na chipindi chingajila kumanyika.
Damupi asabu ngomi na kumuvika lipinga limu na vafyangu. Aku dalili na kugelujula minu.”
“Chipindechi Wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga dawuyifwani na vakavali lilongu yivatolili taa shawu, vayenda kumuyanga Bambu lihungu lya kuheta.
Muhanu wa vala vaveli vapufi na muhanu yivaveli vana luhunja.
Vala vapufi vatolili taa shawu, lakini vatolili ha mafuta va kutaya mula.
Lakini vala yivaveli na luhunja vatolili mafuta musupa pamu na taa shawu.
Kumbi Bambu lihungu lya kuheta kakelwa kwisa, vala vakavali vosi vasisila, pambeli vawonja.
“Payifikili pamihi mandandu, kwavelili na chowu ‘Topi, topi! Bambu wa lihungu akwisa, muyendi mukamuyangi!’
Pambeli vala vakavali vosi vatandamuka, vasitandali taa shawu.
Vala vapufi vavawombela vala yivaveli na luhunja, ‘Mututayili mafuta venu padokwa, taa shetu sikujimika.’
Lakini vala yivaveli na luhunja vavawombela, ‘Ava davatukwili ha yufwi na yumwi! Ngiba muyendi kuduka mukayihemileli!’
Topi, vala vakavali vapufi pavayendili kuhemela mafuta, kumbeli kunu Muheta kafika na vala vakavali vaveli kala vayingila pamu na mweni munyumba ya muheta, pavayingilili kala mlyangu wutatiwa.
“Pambeli vala vakavali vapufi vayisa, vakema, ‘Bambu, Bambu, wutufuwulili!
Lakini mweni kavayangula, nguvawombela nakaka, yumwi ndivamanya ha.’ ”
Pambeli Yesu kadeta, “Topi, mugungi mesu, kwanongwa mumanya ha lijuva wala saa.
“Chipindechi wutwa wa kumbindi dawuvi kucha mundu yumu yadayileyi kuyenda mwanja. Avakemili vandumindumi vaki, kavahadisha mali shaki.
Amupili kila mundu kulinganila na chifwani chaki, yumu amupili mbiya kucha ijala ya mwesi wumu, wingi mbiya kucha ijala ya majuma mavili na wingi kamupa mbiya kucha sha ijala ya lijuma limu, pambeli kayenda mwanja.
Tepu yula yagayiliwili mbiya sha ijala ya mwesi wumu kagolela uchulusi kayegha singi nga sisila,
wuwula wula na yula yagayiliwili mbiya sha ijala ya majuma mavili kagolela uchulusi kayegha singi nga sisila.
Lakini yula yagayiliwili mbiya sha juma limu, kayenda kakumba lyowu kasikulila pasi mbiya sila sha bambu waki.
“Yula bambu payikalili aku lyoo! Pawuyili kakanda kukawula tolitoli ya mbiya sivelili na sivapatili.
Yula ndumindumi yagayiliwili mbiya sha mwesi wumu kayisa na mbiya singi nga sisila sila, kamuwombela, ‘Bambu, wanyimbili mbiya sha ijala ya mwesi wumu, apa siyongisheka singi nga sisila sila.’
Bambu mundu kamuwombela, ‘Nyanyi, kuva ndumindumi msangi na mwaminifu, kuva mwaminifu kwa findu fidokwa ponopa dandikugoli mwaminifu kwa findu fikomi, wisi sekileli pamu na bambu waku!’
“Ndumindumi yagayiliwili mbiya sha ijala ya majuma mavili na mweni kayisa, kadeta, ‘Bambu, wanyimbili mbiya sha ijala ya majuma mavili, ponopa loli kuna mbiya simonga nga sisilasila simbatili.’
Bambu mundu kamuwombela, ‘Nyanyi ndumindumi msangi na mwaminifu, kuva mwaminifu wa chindu chidokwa, dandikupi findu fingi fikomi. Wisi sekileli pamu na bambu waku.’
“Pambeli kayisa yula ndumindumi yagayiliwili mbiya sha ijala ya juma limu, kadeta, ‘Bambu nenga manya kucha yuwi kuva mundu yudindalili, yuwi ukubena pala pawungajila kukweta na kukunganya pala pawungajila kuvaghasha.
Ndatilili, ndayifisili mbiya yaku muuganga. Topi toli mbiya yaku.’
“Bambu mundu kamuwombela, ‘Yuwi kuva ndumindumi mwafu na mgata! Wamanyili kucha nenga ngubena mahali pangajila kukweta na kukunganya pala pangajila kuvaghasha.
Ngiba, ningavikili mbiya shangu kwa vatawula fiyongishekeli yikopesha ningatolili na fwayida yaki!
Topi, mumupoki mbiya asi mukamupi yula mundu muna mbiya sha ijala ya mwesi wumu.
Nongwa yaveli na chindu dagayiliwi na kuyongishiwa. Lakini yula ngajila chindu, dawupokiwi hata chila chidokwa chavelinachu.
Na ayu ndumindumi yangajila fwayida, mumuyasi panji muchisi! Aku dalili na kugelujula minu.’
“Chipindi Mwana wa Mundu yavelili ndi Mutwa payisa muukomi waki pamu na makungu vaki vang'alili, topi dayikali pachigoda chaki cha wutwa chi vaveli na ukomi waki,
vandu va milima yosi dayiyikunguli pawulongolu yaki na mweni davabawuli vandu kucha mdima yavatapula vafungami na vameni.
Davavaviki vandu yivagola fyadayila Chapanga wa mlilu na kuvabava vala yivagola ng'odu fyadayila Chapanga mwambu waki wamkiyi.
Pambeli Mutwa davawombeli vala yivaveli mwambu waki wa mlilu, ‘Mwisi yumwi yimunemiliwili na Tati wenu, mupokeli wutwa wuvavatalishili kukandila kulumba kwa mlima.
Nongwa ndavelili na njala yumwi mwanyimbili na ndavelili nyumilwa yumwi mwanyimbili machi vakulanda na ndavelili muhenja yumwi mwanibushilili,
na ndaveli ngelengi, mufwalisha na ndavelili mtami yumwi mwayisili kunola na ndavelili muchijaka yumwi mwayisili kundyangila!’
“Topi, vandu vala yivagolili fya dayila Chapanga davamuyanguli Mutwa, ‘Bambu, ndili twakuwonili kuna njala yufwi twakupili filivi, awu kuyumilwa yufwi twakupili machi va kulanda?
Ndili waveli muhenja yufwi twakulibushilili na ndili twakuwonili kuva ngelengi yufwi tukufwalisha?
Na ndili twakuwonili kuva mtami awu kuva muchijaka yufwi twisa kukulola?’
Mutwa davayanguli, ‘Nakaka nguvawombela, kila chindu chimuvagolili vamu wa ava vana vangu vadokwa, mwagolili nenga.’
“Pambeli Mutwa davawombeli vala yivaveli mwambu waki wa mkiyi, ‘Muwuki pawulongolu ya nenga yumwi mulapiliwili! Muyendi mulifumbika lya jola litandiwiwili na Lijangavandu pamu na vandumindumi vaki.
Nongwa ndaveli nyumilwa yumwi munyimba ha machi va kulanda.
Ndaveli muhenja yumwi munibushila ha, ndaveli mtami na kuwopiwa muchijaka yumwi mwisa ha kunola.’
“Na veni davayanguli, ‘Bambu, ndili twakuwonili kuva na njala awu kuyumilwa, kuva muhenja awu kuva ngelengi awu kuva mtami na kuwopiwa muchijaka yufwi tukukimbanikila ng'odu?’
Na mweni davayanguli, ‘Nguvawombela nakaka, kila chindu chimulemili kuvagolela vandu vangajila kujakwa kucha ava, mwalemili kugolela nenga.’
Topi, ava davayendi mumotu wa jola wa lifumbika, lakini vala yivagola fyadayila Chapanga davayendi muunofu wa jola.”
Yesu pamalili kudeta fila fyosi, kavawombela vanachuli vaki,
“Mumanya kucha pavapita majuva mavili dakuvi na Lihungu lya pasaka na Mwana wa mundu davakuliwi ili avangiliwi mulupingika”
Chipindechi vatambika vakomi na vavaha na vandu vatangalili vayikunga pamu munyumba ya mtambika mkomi yakemiwa Kayafa.
Vawombana ndambu ya kumukamula Yesu kwa chifisu ili vamuwulayi.
“Kumbi vawombana veni chilongu achi chikotoo kugoleka chipindi cha pasaka, ili yikotoo kubwituka ndilingu pa vandu.”
Yesu paghaveyi Betaniya, kayaki Simoni, munautami wa mwiku,
Mawu yumu yavelili na supa ya alabasta yiveli na mafuta va kunungilila vatalamili, amwisilili pala pamesa paghalyeyi filivi, kamuyitilila vala mafuta va kunungilila kumutwi.
Vanachuli vaki pavawonili afi vakalala, vadeta, “Asala ayi ya liki?
Mafuta ava va kunungilila vangaweshili kuwuliwa kwa mbiya ngomi na vagaju vagayiliwi mbiya asi.”
Yesu amanyili hoshu shawu, kavawombela, “Mbona mukumuyasha mawu ayu? Mweni kagolela chilongu cha nyanyi.
Vagaju muva pamu majuva vosi, lakini nenga dandivi pamu na yumwi majuva wosi ha.
Ayu mawu kanyitilila mafuta va kunungilila akandalisheyi kwa kusikiwa.
Nguvawombela nakaka, poposi pa mlima awu chilongu achi dachilanduliwi, Chilongu cha Nyanyechi cha golili mawu ayu dachitambuliwi kwa ngumbungumbu ya mweni.”
Pambeli Yudasi Sikaliyoti, yumu wa vala lilongu na vavili, kayenda kwa mtambika mkomi,
kavawombela, “Damunyimbi chindu liki kucha pandimuhadika Yesu kwa yumwi?” Vamuvalangila migwala milongu mitatu ya mbiya,
kukandila chipindi achi Yuda akasakeyi fwasi nofu ya kumshengeta Yesu.
Lijuva lya kwaa kabula ya Lihungu lya mibumunda yingajila simika, vanachuli vamuyendilili Yesu vamudasha, “Ukudayila tukakutandili koti filivi fya Pasaka?”
Mweni kavayangula, “Muyendi kumbwani kwa mlulumi tunga, mukamuwombeli, Muwula kadeta, ‘Chipindi cha nenga chifika, kwa yuwi kulya pasaka pamu na vanachuli vangu.’ ”
Vanachuli vagola kucha Yesu vavalayilili, vatanda filivi fya Lihungu.
Payifikili palumihi Yesu ayikalili pamesa pamu na vanachuli vaki lilongu na vavili.
“Nguvawombela nakaka, mundu yumu gati ya yumwi dashyengeti.”
Vanachuli vang'ong'oteka munu, vakanda kumudasha yumu yumu, “Bambu! Ghani, nenga?”
Yesu kayangula, “Yalikishila ndongi muchimbundi pamu na nenga ndi dashyengeti.
Yina Mwana wa Mundu akuyenda kucha Mayandiku vang'alili wuvadeta, ila, pishu mundu yula damshengeti Mwana wa Mundu! Ingaveli ngiba mundu ayu angawonikili ng'odu.”
Pambeli Yudasi yadayileyi amshengeti Yesu, kamdasha, “muwula! Ndiva nenga duu?” Yesu kamuyangula, “Yina, ukudeta yuwi.”
Pavaveghi vakulya, Yesu katola libumunda, kamlumba Chapanga, kalimetula, kavapa vanachuli vaki kunu padeta, “Mtoli mulyi, awu ndi mvili wa nenga.”
Pambeli katola lwindi, kalumba, kavapa kunu padeta, “Mulandi mwavosi.
Kwa nongwa awu ndi mwasi wangu wuumanyisha lilaghanu, mwasi wuumwayika kwanongwa ya vandu vosi ili kuvawushila sambi.
Nguvawombela, danandi kandi ha difwayi ya misabibu mbaka lijuva lingi pananda kandi pamu na yumwi muwutwa wa Tati wangu”
Pasomulili kala msambu, kawuka kayenda muchidunda cha Miseyituni.
Pambeli Yesu kavawombela, “Pamihi panu, yumwi mwavosi damutuvi na kuneka weka yangu, nongwa Mayandiku Vang'alili vakudeta, Chapanga kadeta, ‘dandimtovi mdimi, na vafungami davapwililiki.’
Kumbi nenga pashukukili kala dandivalonguleli aku Galilaya.”
Petili kamuwombela Yesu, “Hata kucha vosi davavi na lyogha na yuwi na kukuleka, nenga dandikuleki ng'odu.”
Yesu kamuwombela, “Nakaka ngukuwombela, pamihi panu njowolu akali hela kuvika, dawunemi myanja mitatu.”
Petili kamuyangula, “Hata leki mani lasima nzovi pamu na yuwi nenga dandikuleki ng'odu.” Na vala vanachuli vamonga vosi vayangula nga wuwula wula.
Pambeli Yesu kayenda pamu na veni kuchitava cha mibiki cha Getisemani, kavawombela, vanachuli vaki, “Mwikali apa, leki nenga nyendi pala pawulongolu ngadadavi.”
Kavatola Petili, Yakobi na Yohani vana va Sebidayu vakanda kuva na ng'ong'u na kugudaguda.
Topi, kavawombela, “Ndina lung'ong'u lukomi mundima mbaka samba sova. Mwikali apa mugungi pamu na nenga.”
Topi, kayenda paulongolu padokwa, kawa wuyifuma, kadadava “Tati wangu, kucha payiweshikana, lwindi alu lunewuki ila yikotoo kuva kucha wudayila nenga, ila kucha wudayila yuwi.”
Kavawuyila vala vanachuli kavawona vawonja. Kamuwombela, “Petili nakaka muwesha ha kugunga pamu na nenga hata kwa lisaa limu?
Mugungi na kudadava ili mukotoo kwingila mumayeshu. Mfuki wukudayila lakini mvili wuva msosuvafu.”
Kayenda kandi mwanja wa pili kadadava, “Tati wangu, kucha yikuweshikana ng'odu lwindi alu lumbiti ngajila nenga kulanda, topi, fiwudayila yuwi figoleki.”
Kavawuyila kandi kavawona vawonja, kwanongwa mesu vawu vaveli wuniwuni.
Topi, kavaleka, kayenda kandi kudadava mwanja wa tatu kwa lisu lililalila.
Pambeli kavawuyila vanachuli vaki, kavawombela, “Mkalihela mukawonja na kupumulila? Mloli! Chipindi cheni chifika, Mwana wa Mundu davamuhadishi mumawoku ya vandu vavelili na sambi
Muyimuki, tuyendi. Mloli! Akwisa yula danshengeti.”
Topi, Yesu paghaveyi akali hela akuwombana nawu, kabwituka Yudasi yumu wa vala lilongu na vavili, akwisa pamu na vandu vamonga yivaveli na mipanga na fimbongu. Yivavelili valayishiwa na vatambika vakomi na vavaha va vandu.
Ayu yadayileyi kumushengeta Yesu, aveli kavapa kala chilangushilu padeta kucha, “Mundu yula yindimjambusha kwa kumunoneli ndi mweni, mumuvakuli!”
Topi Yuda kamselilela Yesu, kamujambusha “Hasi muwula,” Pambeli kamunonela.
Yesu kamuwombela, “Ghanja, goli chiwudayileyi kugola.” Topi vala vandu vayisa kumuvakula Yesu na kumuwopa
Yumu wa vala vanachuli va Yesu kakwemula lipanga lyaki, kamudumula ndumindumi wa mtambika mkomi lijeji.
Yesu kamuwombela, “Wuyishi lipanga lyaku muhala, kwanongwa mundu yoyonda yayiminya kwa lipanga dasovi kwa lipanga.
Wuli, mumanya ng'odu kucha ningaweshili kumuluva Tati wangu na mweni tepu hela anganyeghilili mipinga ya Makungu nendu ya lilongu na mivili?
Lakini davavi wuliwuli mayandiku vang'alili yivadeta kucha ndi yidayiliwa kuva?”
Chipindi chichilachila Yesu kaliwombela lila lipinga liyisili kumukamula na kumvika pasi yawu. “Wuli, mwisa kungamula kwa mipanga na fimbongu kucha wula nenga ndiva mpoki wa findu fya vandu? Majuva vosi ndaveli Munyumba ya Chapanga pang'ula, mbona mwangamulili ng'odu!
Lakini fyosi afi fikugoleka ili mayandiku va vambuyi va chapanga vagoleki.” Pambeli vanachuli vosi vatuva vamuleka.
Topi, vandu vala vamuyegha Yesu kayaki Kayafa, mtambika mkomi, kuvayikunganyili vawula va Malawu na vavaha,
Petili amkovikelili Yesu mbaka paluvagha lwa mtambika mkomi, kayingila mbaka mgati pamu na vadimi ili aweshi kulola findu dafigoleki.
Topi, mtambika mkomi na balasa lyosi vasaka utovileli wa udesi ili vamuwulayi Yesu.
Lakini vapata utovileli wowosi ha, ngimu wuvayisili vatovilela vatangalili va ufyangu. Pambeli vayisa vatovilela vavili,
vadeta, “Mundu ayu adetili: ‘Nguwesha kubowola nyumba ya Chapanga na kuyijenga kandi kwa majuva matatu.’ ”
Mtambika mkomi kawoloka, kamudasha Yesu, “Wuli mbona ukuyangula chindu ng'odu? Vandu ava vakutovilela liki kwa yuwi?”
Lakini Yesu kanyamala jii. Mtambika mkomi kamuwombela, “Wuyilapi kwa litawa lya Chapanga yaveli mnofu, tuwombeli kucha yuwi kuva nakaka Kilistu Mkombola Mwana wa Chapanga!”
Yesu kavawombela “Ukudeta yuwi! Lakini nguvawombela, kukandila ponopa damumuwoni Mwana wa Mundu kayikala mwambu wa mlilu wa yula Bambu muna liwovi, payisa mumbindi ya mafundi va kumbindi ya Chapanga.”
Topi, mtambika mkomi kasavanga yingwa yaki kadeta, “Kaduka! Tukudayila kandi utovileli? Ponopa mpikana paduka mweni.
Yumwi mukuwona wuliwuli?” Veni vayangula, “Akudayiliwa asovi!”
Pambeli vamutemela mita kuwushu na kumuvangula.
Vamonga pavamvanguleyi vadeta, “Yuwi Kilistu Mkombola, tungi ghani kakutova!”
Petili aveli kayikala panji kuwuwa, topi, ndumindumi yumu mdadala kamuyendela Petili, kadeta, “Yuwi vaveli pamu na Yesu wa Galilaya.”
Petili kakana pawulongolu ya vosi, kadeta, “Manya ha kucha ukudeta liki.”
Pafumeyi pamulyangu, ndumindumi wingi mdadala kamuwona, kavawombela yivavelili pala, “Mundu ayu aveli pamu na Yesu wa Nasaleti.”
Petili kakana kandi kunu payilapa, “Mundu ayu ndimumanya ha.”
Tepu, vandu vamu yivawolukili pala vamuyendela Petili, vamuwombela, “Nakaka yuwi Mgalilaya, kumanyikila detelu yaku!”
Topi Petili kakanda kuyilapanga padeta, “Chapanga ang'oni, ndimumanya ng'odu mundu ayu!” Tepu njowolu kavika.
Petili kakumbuka filongu fyamuwombilili Yesu, “Njowolu akalihela kuvika, dawunemi myanja mitatu.” Topi, kafuma panji, kalila munu.
Kukalangali vatambika vakomi na vavaha va vandu yivagolili chitemela kwanongwa ya Yesu ili vamuwulayi.
Vamuwopa luwoyi, vamutola, vamuyegha kwa Pilatu, mkomi wa Valumi.
Topi, Yudasi, ndi yamushengitili, pawonili kucha Yesu kahighiwa kala, kapomela, kavawuyishila vatambika na vavaha yila migwala milongu mitatu ya mbiya.
Kamuwombela, “Mifya kwa kumutawula Mundu yangajila nongwa awulayiwi.” Lakini veni vadeta yufwi fya liki afi? “Kamani umweni.”
Mweni kasiyasilila mbiya sila munyumba ya Chapanga kafuma panji, kayenda, kayichapika luwoyi.
Vatambika vakomi vasitola mbiya sila, vadeta, “Nyanyi ha kusivika nyumba ya Chapanga kwanongwa asi siva mbiya sha mwasi.”
Topi, vawombana, vakahemileli chitava cha muwumbi yivi mahali pa kusikila vandu vatangalili.
Ndi nongwa mbaka nalelu chitava chila chikukemiwa “Chitava cha mwasi.”
Topi, filongu fya mbuyi wa Chapanga Yelimiya fiva. “Vatolili fipandi milongu mya tatu fya mbiya. Fiyifwanili na yula mundu wa Isilaeli vamuchulusili.
Na sila vahemilili wuwowu chitava chamuwumbi kucha bambu palayishili.”
Yesu awolushiwili pawulongolu ya mkomi wa mkowa. Topi, mkomi wa mkowa kamudasha, “Yuwi kuva Mutwa wa Vayawudi?” Yesu kamuyangula, “Ukudeta yuwi.”
Kumbi vatambika vakomi na vavaha pavaveghi vakumuhigha kayangula chindu ha.
Topi, Pilatu kamudasha, “Wuli ukupikana duu fyosi afi fivakuhigha yuwi?”
Topi, Yesu kayangula hata chindu chimu ha, hata mkomi wa mkowa ajingili munu.
Yavelili chishovi kila lihungu lya Pasaka mkomi wa mkowa kuvafuwulilila vayawudi mundu yumu yawopiliwili muchijaka.
Chipindi cha pasaka, kwavelili na mundu yumu yawopiliwili muchijaka litawa lyaki Balaba.
Topi, vandu pavayikungili pamu, Pilatu kavadasha, “Mukudayila ndivafuwulili yoti, gati ya ava vavili, Balaba awu Yesu yivamkema Kilistu?”
Adetili naha kwanongwa amanyili vamuyeghili Yesu pala kwanongwa ya weyi.
Pilatu payikalili pachigoda cha highilu, mwehi mundu amuyeghilili lulayilayi, “Kotoo kwitaya munongwa ya mundu ayu msangi, kwanongwa nalelu gobuleka munu mumilotu kwanongwa ya mweni.”
Lakini vatambika vakomi na vala vavaha yivavajangajanga vandu kucha afuwuliwi Balaba na Yesu awulayiwi.
Pilatu kavadasha, “Yoti kwa ava vavili mukudayila ndimulekisheli?” Veni vamuyangula, “Balaba!”
Pilatu kavadasha, “Ponopa, ndimugoli liki Yesu yivamkema Kilistu?” Vosi vayangula, “Avangiliwi mulupingika!”
Pilatu kavadasha kandi, “Kagola chindu liki?” Veni vayendilela kulandusha lishu, “Avangiliwi mulupingika!”
Topi, Pilatu pamanyili kucha dalemwi kugola chindu chochosi ila ndilingu shakandili hela, atolili machi, kanava mawoku pawulongolu ya lila lipinga lya vandu. Kadeta, “Nenga mumeli ha munjifwa ya mundu ayu, mani mwaveni!”
Vandu vosi vadeta, “Mwasi waki wutuwoni yufwi pamu na vana vetu!”
Topi, Pilatu kavagayila Balaba kufuma muchijaka na vavawombela vandu vamulatuli Yesu fiboku na avangiliwi mulupingika.
Pambeli machonda va Pilatu vamuyingisha Yesu munyumba ngomi ya mkomi wa mkowa, vayikungula chipuga chosi, vamshengitela.
Vamuwopusola yingwa shaki, vamufwalisha lihabiti lya langi ngeli.
Pambeli vapota likokoma lya misomi vamufwalisha kumutwi, vamuvikila lidengi mukuwoku lyaki lya mlilu. Vatundama pawulongolu yaki, vamudanila pavadeta, “Hasi Mutwa wa Vayawudi!”
Vamutemela mita, valitola lila lidengi vamutovela nalyu kumutwi.
Pavamdanilili kala, vamuwopola lila lihabiti, vamufwalisha yingwa shaki, pambeli vamuyegha kumuvangilila mulupingika.
Pavaveghi vakuyenda, vamuwona mundu yumu litawa lyaki Simoni mwenikaya wa Kileni, vamung'ang'anika kuwupapa lupingika lwa Yesu.
Pavafikili mahali pakukemiwa Goligota, manayaki, mahali pa lipava lya mutwi,
vamupa mhashu wa difwayi na chindu chijejemu. Lakini Yesu payeshili kalema kulanda.
Vamuvangilila mulupingika, pambeli vavaghana yingwa shaki kwa kugola do.
Pambeli vayikala pasi vakumlembilela.
Kumbindi ya mutwi waki vavika tangashu ili vandu vamanyi nongwa yivamuhighililili mulupingika, “Ayu ndi Yesu mutwa wa Vayawudi.”
Vapoki vavili vavangiliwili mulupingika wuwowu pamu na Yesu, yumu mwambu wa mlilu na wingi mwambu wa mkiyi.
Vandu yivapiteyi pala vamujowulili kunu pava tikanya mitwi yawu kunu pavadeta,
“Yuwi wayijumili ng'odu kuyibowola nyumba ya Chapanga na kuyijenga kwa majuva matatu? Ponopa wuyilowoli umweni! Kucha yuwi kuva Mwana wa Chapanga, topi, wuyiwushi mulupingika!”
Ngimu wuwowu vatambika vakomi pamu na vawula va Malawu na vavaha vamudanilili pavadeta,
“Wavalowulili vamonga, lakini kulemwa kuyilowola umweni! Kucha mweni mutwa wa Isilaeli! Topi, ponopa asunuki mulupingika na yufwi datumjumili.
Amwidumbili Chapanga na kudeta, kucha mweni mwana wa Chapanga, topi Chapanga amulowoli kucha akumudayila.”
Ngimu wuwowu na vala vavangiliwili pamu na Yesu vamujowulili.
Kukandila saa sita pamusi mbaka saa tisa chisi chagubikili mlima wosi.
Payifikili saa tisa naha Yesu kalila kwa lishu likomi, “Eli, Eli lama sabakitani?” Mana yaki, “Chapanga wangu, Chapanga wangu, mbona kuneka?”
Lakini vala vawolukili pala pavapikanishili naha vacha, “Akumkema Eliya”
Yumu wa vala katuva katola lindelindeli kajabika musiki, kayivika muludengi kamupa afyombi.
Vamonga vadeta, “Leki tuloli kucha Eliya dayisi kumulowola.”
Topi Yesu kalila kandi kwa lishu likomi, kasova.
Topi, lupayi lwa mugati lukikisha nyumba ya Chapanga na chumba gati ya nyumba ya Chapanga lidemuka filepa fivili, kufumila kumbindi mbaka pasi, mlima utikanyika, migonguveli yibaluka,
sembi sifuwuka na vandu vang'alili vafwili vashukushiwa.
Na veni pavashukukili kala vafuma musembi, vayingila Yelusalemu mbwani ying'alili, vawoneka na vandu vatangalili.
Topi, mkomi wa vala machonda na machonda vaki yivamulembileleyi Yesu pavawonili chiyighayigha cha mlima na fila findu fibwitukili vatila munu, vadeta, “Nakaka Mundu ayu Mwana wa Chapanga!”
Pala vavelili wuwowu vadadala vatangalili vakulola kwa kutali. Ava ndi vadala vamukovikelili Yesu kufuma Galilaya pavamkimbanikila.
Pagati yawu aveli wuwowu Maliya Magadalena na Maliya mawawu Yakobi na Yosefu pamu na mawawu vana va Sebidayu.
Payiveyi palumihi, kayisa mundu yumu mlundamali mwenikaya wa Alimataya, litawa lyaki Yosefu, mweni wuwowu aveli mwana chuli wa Yesu.
Kamuyendela Pilatu, kaluva agayiliwi chikongu cha Yesu. Topi, Pilatu kalamula agayiliwi.
Yosefu katola chila chikongu, kachishengiteshela ligubiku lya nyanyi
kachivika mgati ya sembi yaki ya shonu yisonguliwili muligangachuma, pambeli kalibilibisha ligangachuma likomi paulongolu ya sembi, mweni kawuka.
Maliya Magadalena na yula Maliya wingi vayikalili pasi wushu valola kula kusembi.
Chilawu yaki ndi lijuva lya mwanja wamumbeli yila ya kuyitalisha, vatambika vakomi na Mafwalisayu, vamuyendilili Pilatu,
vadeta, “Bambu, tukumbuka kucha yula mdesi adetili paghaveyi akali hela kusova, ‘Kucha pavapita majuva matatu dashukuki.’
Kwa nongwa ayi wuvawombeli vamachonda vadima sembi ya mundu ayu mbaka majuva matatu, ili vanachuli vaki vakotoo kumuhija na kuvawombela vandu kucha kashukuka. Ufyangu wa mwishu dawuvi wa wafu munu pitu wula wa mwanja mtasi.”
Pilatu kavawombela, “Topi muvanawu vamachonda, muyendi mukalidimi kucha wumuwesha yumwi.”
Topi, vayenda, vayidimi sembi, vamatikila na kushayisha lila ligangachuma na kuvaleka vamachonda vadimi.
Palipelili lijuva lya kupumulila na kukaveli samba kulangala ya lijuva lila lya Jumapili, Maliya Magadalena na yula Maliya wingi vayendili kuyilola yila sembi.
Tepu liwoneka liyighayigha likomi mumlima Makungu wa Bambu kasunuka kufuma kumbindi kwa Chapanga kalibilibisha lila ligangachuma, kalikalila.
Ang'alili kucha lumuli na yingwa shaki shaveli mbuleteee.
Vamachonda vala yivadimagha sembi vabagamili, livayingila lyogha likomi, vashulula.
Lakini yula Makungu kavawombela vala vadadala, “Yumwi mukotoo kutila! Manya kucha mukumsaka Yesu yavangiliwili mulupingika.
Kwahela mundu apa nongwa kashukuka kucha wadetili. Mwisi mukaloli pala pavachiwonjishili chikongu.
Topi, muyendi kalopu mukavawombeli vanachuli vaki kucha kashukuka kufuma muvasovili na ponopa akuvalongulela kula Galilaya, aku damumuwoni. Muvi na ngumbungumbu na afi finiwawombilili.”
Topi vala vadadala vawuka kalopu pala pasembi, vatuva vayenda kuvawombela vanachuli vaki.
Tepu, Yesu katang'ana nawu, kadeta, “Hawije!” Vadadala vala vamuyendela, vatundama pawulongolu yaki, vakola mawulu nakumujuma.
Pambeli Yesu kavawombela, “Mkotoo kutila! Muyendi mukavawombeli valongu vangu vayendi Galilaya davang'oni aku.”
Vala vadadala pavaveghi vakuyenda vadima vamu va sembi yila vayendili kumbwani kuvalandulila vatambika vakomi filongu fyosi fibwitukili.
Topi, vatangana na vavaha pavawombilili kala, vavapa mbiya sitangalili vala vamachonda
vadeta, “Yumwi mukadeti naha, vanachuli vaki vahija chikongu chaki yufwi tukaveli tuwonja.
Na kucha mkomi wa mkowa pamanya chilongu achi, yufwi datuwombani na mweni na yumwi damupati msayisayi ha!”
Vala vadima vasitola sila mbiya, vagola kucha pavawuliwili. Chilongu achi chikwila kwa Vayawudi mbaka nalelu.
Vala vanachuli lilongu na yumu vayendili Galilaya kuchidunda chila chavalaghili Yesu.
Pavamuwonili vajuma, hata leki vamonga vavelili na hoshu,
Yesu kaselela pabehi, kavawombela, “Gayiliwa ukomi wosi wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga na mumlima awu.
Topi, muyendi, mukavagoli vandu va milima na makabila vosi vavi vanachuli vangu, pamuvabatisha kwa litawa lya Tati na lya Mwana na lya Mfuki Mng'alili.
Muvawuli kukamula Malawu vosi yindivagayilili. Na nenga ndiva pamu na yuwi majuva vosi, mbaka mwishu wa mlima.”
Achi ndi Chilongu cha Nyanyi cha Yesu Kilistu, Mwana wa Chapanga. Mayandiku vamu va dahili vavahela Mwana wa Chapanga.
Chakandili kucha wayandikili Isaya yaveli mbuyi wa Chapanga: “Chapanga adetili, ‘Dandimlayishi makungu wangu akuwombeli, dayakutandili deha yaku.’
Mundu yumu akukema kucheja, ‘Mugoli deha ya Bambu, muhololi deha yaki!’ ”
Topi Yohani mbatisha afumbukili kucheja, alandulili kucha vandu vapomeli sambi na kuvabatisha, kavawombela vandu, “Ili Chapanga avapomeli sambi shawu.”
Vandu vatangalili kufuma mlima wa Yudeya na mbwani ya Yelusalemu vayenda kumpikanisha Yohani. Vasipomela sambi shawu, mweni kavabatisha mulweni Yoludani.
Yohani mbatisha afwalili yingwa yavagolilili kwa mingoma ya ngamiya na lufunga lwa ngwembi muchiwunu chaki na alili ngumbingumbi na njuki ya mudasi.
Kavawombela vandu, “Akwisa mundu yaveli na liwovi kupita nenga. Nenga ngujakwa ha hata kugondama kuwopola ng'oyi sha mikobasi yaki.
Nenga nguvabatisha kwa machi, ila mweni daavabatishi kwa Mfuki Mng'alili.”
Majuva vala, Yesu afumili Nasaleti, kumlima wa Galilaya, kabatishiwa na Yohani mbatisha mulweni Yoludani.
Tepu pabwitukili mumachi, kawona kumbindi kwa Chapanga kufuwuka na Mfuki Mng'alili kamsunukila kucha njiva.
Na lishu lipikanika kufuma kumbindi, lideta “Yuwi mwana wangu yingutamili, mayiliwa na yuwi.”
Tepu Mfuki Mng'alili kamugola ayendi kucheja,
aku ayikalili kwa majuva milongu mchechi payeshiwa na Lijangavandu. Vang'ongolu va mudasi vaveli pala, lakini vamakungu vayisa vamkimbanikila.
Yohani mbatisha pavamtatilili kala muchijaka, Yesu ayendili mlima wa Galilaya kuvalandulila vandu Chilongu cha Nyanyi cha Chapanga.
Padeta, “Chipindi chifika, Wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga wuva pabehi! Mupomeli na muchijumili Chilongu cha Nyanyi!”
Yesu patyangeyi muluwongu ya lihiva lya Galilaya, kavawona Simoni pamu na Andeleya mlongu mundu, pavafuva vasomba kwa lwafu.
Yesu kavawombela, “Mungovikeli na nenga dandivagoli kuva vafuva vandu.”
Tepu vasileka njafu shawu, vamkovekela.
Paayendili pawulongolu padokwa, kavawona Yakobi na Yohani vana va Sebidayu, vayikala muwatu pavasambula njafu shawu.
Bahala pala, Yesu kavakema. Veni vamleka tati wawu Sebidayu na vala vagolafichuku va mula muwatu, vamkovekela Yesu.
Yesu na vanachuli vaki vayendili mumbwani ya Kapelinaumu. Palifikili Lijuva lya Kupumulila, Yesu kayingila Munyumba ya kudadavila kakanda kuwula.
Vandu vala vapikanishili ng'ulilu yaki vayikang'anika nendu, nongwa kavawula ha kucha vawula vawu va Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa, ila yaveli na uwesu.
Bahala pala mundu yavelili na mfuki mwafu kayingila Munyumba ya kudadavila, kawuta kwa lishu likomi,
“Ukudayila kutugola liki, Yesu wa Nasaleti? Kwisa kutuyaghamisha? Ngumanya, Yuwi Mng'alili wa Chapanga!”
Yesu kamulakalila chinyamkela, “Matu! Kopoki kwa mundu ayu!”
Chinyamkela kamtaya chipwembu mundu yula, kawuta kwa lishu likomi, kakopoka kwa mundu yula.
Vandu vosi vayikanganika nendu, vakandili kwidasha, “Achi chindu liki? Ayi ng'ulilu ya shonu na uwesu? Mundu ayu akuwesha kuvalakalila finyamkela na veni vakumpikana!”
Filongu fya Yesu filopokesha kukwila kosi kumlima wa Galilaya.
Tepu pavafumili Munyumba ya kudadavila, Yesu pamu na Yakobi na Yohani vanachuli vaki vayenda kaya ya Simoni na Andeleya.
Nafyala wa Simoni avelili kawonja pawulili akutamika. Yesu pafikili, bahala pala vamuwombela chilongu cha mawu ayu.
Topi Yesu kaselela kwa mawu yula mtami, kamkola liwoku kunu pamtandamusha. Utami umfuma mawu yula na mweni kakanda kuvakimbanikila.
Lumihi palufikili na lijuva palidibili, vandu vamuyeghela Yesu vatami vosi na vandu yivavelili na finyamkela.
Vandu vosi va mbwani vayikungula paluvagha,
Yesu kavalowola vandu vatangalili yivavelili vakutamika matami va kila ndambu, kandi kafumisha finyamkela vatangalili. Kavagayila ng'odu finyamkela fwasi ya kuywanga, kwanongwa vamumanyili mweni ghani.
Chilawu yaki linyavagogolu, Yesu kayimuka, kawuka kaya kayenda pangajila vandu. Aku Yesu kamdadavila Chapanga.
Simoni na vayaki vayenda kumsaka.
Pavamuwonili vamuwombela, “Kila mundu akakusakeyi yuwi.”
Yesu kavayangula, “Tuyendi fijiji fimonga fiveli pabehi, ngavalandulili vandu wuwula. Topi nyisa niyilata chichuku achi.”
Naha katyanga mumlima wosi wa Galilaya, palandula Munyumba sha kudadavila na kuwusha finyamkela.
Mundu yavelili na ukalava amuyendilili Yesu kamtundamila na kamluva, kadeta, “Pawudayila, ukuwesha kung'ofuwa!”
Yesu amuwonilili lusungu, kaholosha liwoku lyaki, kamkamula. Pambeli kamuwombela, “Ngudayila ngutangi ung'ali!”
Bahala pala ukalava umfuma mundu yula, kang'ala.
Pambeli Yesu kamuwombela ayendi, kamkayika,
kamuwombela, “Pikanishi, ukotoo kumuwombela mundu yoyosi chilongu achi ila yendi ukayilangushi kwa mtambika. Pambeli uyeghi litambiku kwa Chapanga kucha alayilili mbuyi wa Chapanga Musa, vandu valoli utovileli kwa veni.”
Lakini mundu yula kawuka kakanda kukwisha chilongu chila kosi, mbaka Yesu kalemwa kuyingila kumbwani kunu pawoneka. Ila kayikala panji, pangajila vandu. Lakini hata aku, vandu vamyendela kufuma mbembu shosi.
Pavapitili majuva vamu, Yesu kawuya Kapelinaumu na vandu vapikanila kava pakaya.
Vandu vatangalili vayikungasha hata fwasi yiva kwahela, vamema paluvagha losi. Yesu avelili akuvalandulila chilongu.
Vandu vamu, mchechi vamuyeghili mundu yumu yapombalili, vamuyeghela Yesu.
Kwanongwa vandu vaveli vatangala, valemwili kumuyegha mundu yula pala paveli Yesu. Topi vatobulili kulituvili, mwaveli Yesu. Pavatobulili kala lilanga, vamsunusha mundu yula yaveli kawonja muwulili.
Yesu pamuwonili ndambu ya ujumilwa wawu, kamuwombela mundu yula yapombalili, “Mwana wangu, ngupomela sambi shaku.”
Vawuli vamonga va Malawu yivaveli vayikala pala vakaiholeyi ndima shawu.
“Akwidumba liki pawombeyi nawula? Akumjowola Chapanga! Kwa hela mundu yapomela sambi, ila Chapanga weka yaki.”
Bahala pala Yesu amanyili kala Chivayihola, avawombilili, “Wuli mbona mukwihola ndambu ayi mundima shenu?.
Choti chiveli chipusuka, kumuwombela mundu ayu yapombalili, ‘Kupomiliwa sambi shaku’, Awu kumuwombela, ‘Utoli ulili waku, witwiki yendi’?.
Ponopa ngudayila mumanyi, Mwana wa Mundu kana uwesu wa kuvapomela vandu sambi shawu pamulima.” Pala pamuwombilili mundu yula yapombalili,
“Ngukuwombela tandamuki, toli ulili waku na yendi kaya yaku!”
Pala vandu vosi vaveli vakumlola, mundu yula kawoloka, katola ulili waki, kayenda. Vandu vosi vayikanganika, vamjuma Chapanga pavadeta, “Tukali hela kuchiwona chindu kucha achi!”
Yesu kayenda kandi muluwongu lwa lihiva. Lipinga lya vandu limkovekela, mweni kakanda kuvawula.
Papiteyi kamuwona Lawi mwana wa Alufayu kayikala muofisi ya vasumula mbiya ushulu. Yesu kamuwombela, “Ungovikeli.” Lawi katandamuka kamkovekela.
Pambeli Yesu aveli kayikala munyumba ya lawi akulya filivi. Vasumula mbiya vatangalili na vala yivavakema yivaveli na sambi vamkovikela, vayikala pamu na Yesu pamesa na vandundami vaki vakulya.
Vawuli vamonga va Malawu va Chapanga yivamupili Musa vaveli mulipinga vakulikema Vafwalisayu vamuwona Yesu paghalya pamu na vandu yivavakema yivaveli na sambi na vasumula mbiya. Vavadasha vanachuli vaki, “Wuli akulya pamu na vasumula mbiya sha ushulu na yivaveli na sambi?”
Yesu kavapikanisha kavawombela, “Vandu yivaveli na njimba nofu vakudayila ha mwilwana, yivadayila mwilwana vala yivaveli vatami. Nenga nyisa kuvakema vandu yivayihola veni goleki ha, ila yivaveli na sambi.”
Chipindi chimu vanachuli va Yohani mbatisha na vanachuli va Vafwalisayu vaveli vakwikaja kulya. Vandu vamonga vayisa kumdasha Yesu. “Wuli vanachuli va Yohani na va Vafwalisayu vakwikaja kulya lakini vanachuli vaku vakwikaja ha kulya?”
Yesu kavayangula, “Wuli vavalalikili kulihungu lya kuheta mkuvadayila vayikaji kulya chipindi vava pamu na Bambu wa lihungu lya kuheta vaweshi ng'odu kuyikaja kulya.
Lakini chipindi dachiyisi Bambu wa lihungu lya kuheta davamuwushi pala pavayikaleyi pamu, chipindi achi davayikaji kulya.
“Vandu vakudumula ha chipapi cha shonu na kusonela muyingwa ngulungulu. Mani pavagola naha, achi chipapi dachinyopoli yingwa ngulungulu, yeni dayidemuki nendu.
Vandu vakutayaya ha difwayi ya shonu mumihaku ya ngwembi yadahili. Pavagola naha, difwayi daubaluli ayi mihaku ya ngwembi, difwayi na mihaku dayidanganyiki. Difwayi ya shonu vakutaya mumihaku ya ngwembi ya shonu.”
Lijuva lya Kupumulila, Yesu aveli papita mufitava fya mupunga. Paghaveyi akupita, vanachuli vaki vakanda kudumula misasa ya fivelekwa.
Vafwalisayu vamuwombela, “Loli! Wuli vakugola chindu chikaniwili Lijuva lya Kupumulila?”
Yesu kavayangula, “Mukali hela kusoma fyagolili Dawudi pamu na vamonga chipindi pavaveghi na njala?
Mumajuva va mtambika mkomi Abyatali, Dawudi ayingilili munyumba ya Chapanga na kulya mibumunda yivikiliwi kwa Chapanga. Chindu achi chigoleka chipindi cha Abyatali aveli mtambika mkomi wa Chapanga. Nayiva vatambika weka yau yivaveli vajumiliwa kulya mibumunda yila. Lakini Dawudi kalya na kavagayila na vayaki.”
Pambeli Yesu kavawombela, “Lijuva lya Kupumulila livikiwa kuvatanga vandu. ila vandu kwanongwa ya Lijuva lya Kupumulila ha!
Nenga mwana wa Mundu ndiva Bambu hata kwa Lijuva lya Kupumulila.”
Pambeli Yesu kayenda kandi Munyumba ya kudadavila. Amu kwavelili na mundu yavelili na liwoku lipombalili.
Vandu vamu vavelili mula vaveli vakumsakila nongwa ya kumhigha. Ponopa vamlolela kucha angamlowulili Lijuva lya kupumulila.
Yesu kamuwombela mundu ayu yapombalili liwoku, “Wisi apa.”
Pambeli kavadasha, “Wuli malawu vetu vakutujumisha kugola liki mulijuva lya kupumulila? Kugola findu fya nyanyi awu fya wafu, kumlowola mundu akotoo kusova awu kumuwulagha?” Lakini veni vayangulili chindu ha.
Apa kavalola vosi kwa maya, kunu kavawonela lusungu ndambu ndima shawu sikamalili, Pambeli kamuwombela mundu yula, “Holoshi liwoku lyaku!” Mweni kaholosha liwoku lyaki, bahala pala liwoku lyaki liva kandi linofu.
Tepu Vafwalisayu vafumili panji ya Nyumba ya kudadavila, vakawombaneyi pamu na lipinga lidokwa lya vandu va Helodi, vakasakeyi ndambu ya kumuwulagha Yesu.
Yesu kawuka pala pamu na vanachuli vaki, ayendili muluwongu ya lihiva lya Galilaya, lipinga lya vandu lyamkovikelili. Vandu vala vafumili milima ya Yelusalemu na Yudeya,
pamu na Yelusalemu na Idume na kumwambu ya lweni Yoludani, mbwani ya Tilu na Sidoni. Vandu ava vatangalili vamyendela Yesu, kwanongwa vapikanishili findu fitangalili fyagolili.
Lipinga lya vandu lyaveli likomi mbaka Yesu avawombilili vanachuli vaki vamvikili watu wumu, ili lipinga lya vandu likotoo kumfwasha.
Aveli kavalowola vandu vatangalili na vosi vaveli vatami vakalevanileyi vamugufyi Yesu.
Vandu vavelili na finyamkela pavamuwonili, vawili pawulongolu yaki, pavawuta, “Yuwi kuva Mwana wa Chapanga!”
Lakini Yesu, kavakanila vakotoo kuvawombela vandu mweni ghani.
Yesu kakwela kuchidunda kavakema vala avadayilili mweni, topi vamyendela,
mweni kavashawula vandu lilongu na vavili avakemili vandundami. Kavawombela, “Ndivashawula yumwi kuva na nenga, dandivalayishi kuyenda kuvalandulila vandu,
damuvi na uwesu wa kuwusha finyamkela.”
Ava lilongu na vavili yavashawulili vaveli Simoni, Yesu amkemili Petili,
Yakobi na Yohani vana va Sebidayu Yesu avakemili Bowaneligi, mana yaki “Vandu va kuwumba”,
Andeleya na Filipu na Batulumeyu na Mateyi na Tomasi na Yakobi mwana va Alufayu na Tadeyu na Simoni yayitashila mlima.
Yudasi Sikaliyoti, yula yamushengitili Yesu.
Pambeli Yesu kayenda kaya. Vandu vatangalili vatangana kandi mbaka Yesu na vanachuli vaki vawesha ha kulya filivi.
Valongu vaki pavapikanishili naha, vayenda kumtola, kwanongwa vandu vakacheyi, “Yesu kajumba lisini.”
Vawula va Malawu vafumili Yelusalemu vadeta, “Ayu aveli na Besibuli! Ndi mkomi wa finyamkela yamgayila uwesu wa kuvafumisha finyamkela.”
Yesu kavakema na kuvawombela kwa filangushilu, “Yikuweshikana wuliwuli Lijangavandu amfumishi Lijangavandu mumonga?
Kucha wutwa pawitapula weni kuva fipinga na kwitova, wutwa awu dawuwi.
Na leki kaya payitapula fipinga fipinga, kaya asi dasiwi.
Kucha naha, wutwa wa Lijangavandu weni pawitapula, dawuwi na kufika mwishu.
“Kwahela mundu yawesha kwingila munyumba ya mundu muna liwovi na kufitola findu fya mundu ayu, ngajila kuwopiwa tanila mundu ayu.
“Nguvawombela nakaka, vandu davawushiwi sambi shawu shosi na majowolu vawu vosi kwa Chapanga.
Lakini mundu yoyosi yamjowola Mfuki Mng'alili, ayu dapomiliwi ha, kwanongwa kagola sambi ya jola.”
Yesu adetili nahawu kwanongwa vandu vadetili, “Yesu kana finyamkela.”
Pambeli mau na valongumundu Yesu vayisa. Vawoloka panji, vamlayisha mundu ayingili munyumba akamkemi.
Lipinga likomi lya vandu lyaveli limshengetela pavampikanisha Yesu. Veni vamuwombela, “Mau waku na valongu vaku vava panji vakukusaka yuwi.”
Yesu kavayangula, “Mau wangu na valongu vangu vaghani?”
Pambeli kavalola vandu vamshengitilili na kadeta, “Mloli! Ava ndi mau wangu na valongu vangu!
Mundu yoyosi yagola ndambu yadayila Chapanga, ayu ndi mau wangu, mlongu wangu na mhaja wangu.”
Yesu kakanda kandi kuwula muluwongu ya lihiva lya Galilaya. Lipinga likomi lya vandu limshengitilili lyaveli likomi, mbaka kayipaka muwatu na kuyikala amu na vandu vosi vaikala muluwongu lwa lihiva.
Kavawula filongu fitangalili kwa filangushilu avawombilili,
“Mpikanishi! Mundu yakweta ayendili kukweta mbeyu.
Paghaveyi akukweta mbeyu, simonga shaponikili mudeha, vambongu vayisa valya.
Simonga shaponikili muuganga wuveli na migonguveli gonguveli. Mbeyu asi simela kalopu nongwa miganga midokwa.
Lakini palifumili lijuva, liyumisha muhali kwanongwa mikigha yaki iyenda ha pasi.
Simonga shaponikili mumisomi, misomi yikula, yikekeneka muhali, kwanongwa ayi silela ha.
Lakini simonga shaponikili muwuganga wa nyanyi. Simela, sikula na kulela fivelekwa, simonga shiyongesheka selu ndatu, simonga selu sita na simonga selu mya!”
Pamalilili Yesu kavawombela, “Mundu yeveli na majeji va kupikanishila, apikani!”
Yesu paghaveyi weka hela, vandu vamu vaveli vakumpikanisha pamu na vanachuli vaki lilongu na vavili vamdasha avahimulili filangushilu afi.
Yesu kavawombela, “Yumwi mgayiliwa mbwepu sha Wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga, lakini vamonga, vakuwombiwa kila chindu kwa chilangushilu,
ili, ‘Pavalola valoli, lakini vakotoo kuwona, pavapikana vapikani, lakini vakotoo kumanya, Kwa nongwa kucha pavamanya, vakuwesha kumuwuyila Chapanga, na mweni akuwesha kuvapomela sambi shawu.’ ”
Pambeli Yesu kavadasha, “Mumanya ng'odu mana ya chilangushilu achi? Ponopa damumanyi wuliwuli filangushilu fimonga?
Mbeyu yikwetiwili ndi chilongu cha Chapanga.
Vandu vamonga yavafumbukili kucha mbeyu siponikilili mudeha. Pavapikanisha chilongu cha Chapanga, bahala pala Lijangavandu akwisa akuchitola chilongu mundima shawu.
Vandu vamonga vafumbukili kucha mbeyu siponikilili muuganga wuveli na migonguveli gonguveli. Pavapikana chilongu bahala pala vakuchiyanga kunu pavachinemelela.
Lakini chilongu achi chikuyingila ha mugati topi vayendelela padokwa. Msayisayi na sida pasiyisa kwanongwa ya chilongu, bahala pala vakuleka kujumila.
Vandu vamonga vakwifwana na mbeyu siponikilili pa mibiki ya misomi. Ava ndi vandu vapikana chilongu,
ila chipwembwi cha ngalilu ayi, kudayila unayiza na kudayila findu fya ndambu shosi, fikuvayingila na kuchikekeneka chilongu na vandu ava vakulela ha vivelekwa.
Lakini vandu vamonga vakwifwana na mbeyu siponikilili muwuganga wa nyanyi. Ava vakuchipikana chilongu, vakuchijumila na kulela fivelekwa, vamonga myanja mitatu, vamonga myanja sita na vamonga myanja mya.”
Yesu kayendelela kuvawombela, “Kuna mundu yagubika luliku kwa chiyungu? Awu akuluvika pachindangawala?
Kila chindu chifisiwili dachivi lipala na chochosi chigubikiwili dachigubutuliwi.
Mundu muna majeji va kupikanishila, apikani!”
Yesu kavawombela kandi, “Mloli unofu fila fimpikana! Chigelu chichila chimuvapimila vayenu, Chapanga na mweni davapimili chigelu chichila yumwi, kandi na kuvayongishela.
Mundu yaveli na chindu dayongishewi na mundu yangajila chindu, hata chidokwa chaveli nachu, dapokiwi.”
Yesu kayendilela kudeta, “Wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga ukwifwana ndambu ayi. Mundu mumonga akukweta mbeyu kufitava.
Pamihi akuwonja ng'onju, pamusi kava mesu, chipindi achi mbeyu sila sikumela na kukula. Mweni kamanya ng'odu ndambu pasimela na kukula.
Uganga weni ukuwugola muhali ukuli na kulela, likutala kutomola mihamba, kandi ndulu, pambeli ukuyela.
Mbeyu, fivelekwa pafikomala, bahala pala mundu ayu akukanda kubena, kwanongwa chipindi cha mbena chifika.”
Yesu kadasha kandi, “Wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga ukuyifwana na chindu liki? Tutoli chilangushilu liki kuwuhimulila?
Ukuyifwana na mbeyu dokwa, mbeyu dokwa nendu pitu shosi sikwetiwa mufitava.
Lakini pasikwetiwa, sikukula na kuva libiki likomi pitu mibiki yosi ya mufitava. Kandi likuva na mitafyi mikomi mbaka vambongu vakuwesha kugola fiyumba fyawu mumitafyi ayi.”
Yesu kavalandulila vandu chilongu chaki kwa filangushilu fingi fitangalili fya ndambu ayi. Kaywanga nawu ndambu pavaweshili kufimanya.
Kaywanga nawu chindu chochosi ha ngajila kutola chilangushilu Lakini paghaveyi na vanachuli vaki weka yawu, avawombilili mana ya kila chilangushilu.
Lumihi lijuva lilila lila, Yesu kavawombela vanachuli vaki, “Tujabuki, tuyendi kumwambu ya lihiva.”
Topi valileka lipinga lya vandu. Vanachuli vayingila muwatu mwayipakili Yesu na vawuka pamu. Kwaveli na matu vamonga.
Bahala pala, liyisa liwumbula na majinga vakanda kutova watu mbaka machi vakanda kumema muwatu wula.
Yesu aveli kumbeli muwatu kasaghamila musahamu. Vanachuli vamuyimusha, vamuwombela, “Muwula, ukulola ng'odu ndambu yitumilwa?”
Yesu kayimuka, kalilakalila liwumbula lila na kavawombela majinga, “Nyamali jii!” Liwumbula linyamala na kulindivala jii.
Pambeli Yesu kavawombela, “Mukutila liki? Mukali muvahela ujumilwa?”
Na veni vatila nendu na vayidasha veni, “Ayu mundu wa ndambu liki? Hata liwumbula na majinga fyosi fikumjumila!”
Yesu na vanachuli vaki vajabuka kumwambu ya lihiva lya Galilaya, mumlima wa Vagelasi.
Tepu Yesu pajabukili muwatu, katang'ana na mundu yafumbukili kumbaku siveli kusembi muna finyamkela.
Mundu ayu aveli akwikala kumbaku siveli kusembi na kwahela mundu yaweshili kumuwopa kandi hata kwa lingongola,
myanja yitangalili aveli pawopiwa mawoku na mawulu, lakini aveli padumula lingongola na akuketula ng'oyi shawopiwili. Na kwahela mundu yavelili na liwovi lya kumkamula.
Majuva vosi aveli payenda-yenda kusembi na kufidunda, pawuta na kuyikesa-kesa kwa migonguveli.
Pamuwonili Yesu kutali, kamtuvilila na kumtundamila.
Kawuta kwa lishu likomi na kudeta, “Yesu, Mwana wa Chapanga yaveli kumbindi nendu! Ukudayila liki kwa nenga? Wilapi kwa litawa lya Chapanga, ngukudadava ukotoo kugobola!”
Adetili naha kwanongwa Yesu adetili, “Yuwi chinyamkela, umfumi mundu ayu!”
Pambeli Yesu kamdasha, “Litawa lyaku ghani?” Mweni kamyangula, “Litawa lyangu ‘Lipinga’ kwanongwa tutangala!”
Pambeli kayendelela kumluva Yesu akotoo kuvavinga finyamkela panji ya mumlima wula.
Kwaveli na lipinga likomi lya vangubi pabehi na chidunda vavelili vakulya.
Topi finyamkela vala vamluva Yesu pavadeta, “Tuyeghi kwa vangubi na utulekisheli tuvayingili.”
Yesu kavalekishela na finyamkela vala vamfuma mundu yula na kuyingila kwa vangubi. Lipinga lyosi lya vangubi elufu mbili vatuvilila mulihiva vamilwa machi vasova.
Vandu vavelili vakudima vangubi vala vatuva na kuvawombela vandu chilongu chila mumbwani na kufitava. Vandu vayenda kulola chila chigolikili,
pavafikili kwa Yesu, vamuwona mundu yula yavelili na lipinga lya finyamkela kayikala, kafwala yingwa shaki na luhala lwaki lumuwuyila, vosi vatila.
Vala vachiwonili chindu achi, vavawombela vandu vamonga chindu chimbwitukilili mundu yula yavelili na finyamkela na chilongu cha vangubi vala.
Topi, vandu vamluva Yesu awuki mumlima wawu.
Yesu paghaveyi akwipaka muwatu, mundu yula yavelili na finyamkela kamluva vawuki pamu.
Lakini Yesu kamukanila. Kamuwombela, “Yendi kaya kwa valongu vaku kavawombeli filongu fyosi Bambu fyakugolilili na ndambu yakuwonilili lusungu.”
Topi, mundu yula kuyenda kulandula milandu yosi ya Yesu yamgolilili aku Dekapoli. Na vandu vosi vapikanilili vajinga.
Yesu kayipaka kandi muwatu kajabuka kumwambu ya lihiva. Lipinga likomi lya vandu lyamshengitelili muluwongu ya lihiva.
Mundu yumu yavelili mkomi wa nyumba ya kudadavila, litawa lyaki Yailu ayendili, pamuwonili Yesu, kamtundamila,
kamluva Yesu padeta, “Muhinja wangu akutamika dabadaba. Dekudeku wisi, umvikili mawoku vaku, ili anani.”
Topi, Yesu awukili pamu na Yailu. Vandu vamkovikela na kumkekeneka-kekeneka kwanongwa vatangalili ngenju.
Paveli mdadala yumu yavelili na utami wa liholuveya myaka lilongu na mivili.
Mdadala ayu aifwashili nendu kwa vayilwana na amalili findu fyaki fitangalili, lakini kanana ha, ila kayendelela kutamika nendu chipindi chosi.
Papikanishili chilongu cha Yesu kwa vandu, kayisa na kayikekeneka kekeneka kupita mulipinga lya vandu. Kamyendela Yesu kwa kumbeli na kuyigufya yingwa yafwalili Yesu,
mweni ayidetilili, “Pagufya yingwa yaki hela, danani.”
Kagufya yingwa ya Yesu, bahala pala liholuveya limuwoloka na mweni kayiwona mumvili waki kucha utami unana.
Bahala pala Yesu kamanya liwovi limyangila. Topi, kalighalambukila lipinga lya vandu kadasha, “Ghani yagufyili yingwa yangu?”
Vanachuli vaki vamyangula, “Ukuwona ndambu vandu yavakukekeneka kekeneka na yuwi ukudasha, ‘Ghani ayu yakugufyili?’”
Lakini Yesu kayendelela kulola amuwoni mundu yagolili chindu achi.
Mdadala yula kachimanya chindu chimbwitukilili, ndambu ayi kamyendela pabagama kwa lyogha. Kamuwila pamawulu vaki, pambeli kamuwombela fyosi nakaka.
Yesu kamuwombela, “Kamwali wangu, ujumilwa waku wukulowola. Yendi kwa kusika na wuvi mnofu.”
Yesu paghaveyi akudeta ndambu ayi, vayisa vandu kufuma kaya ya Yailu, yula mkomi wa nyumba ya kudadavila. Vamuwombela Yailu, “Muhinja waku kasova kala. Wuli ukumyasha muwula?”
Lakini Yesu papikanishili chavadetili, kabedala, kamuwombela yula mkomi wa nyumba ya kudadavila, “Kotoo kutila, ujumili hela.”
Yesu kadayila ng'odu mundu yoyosi ayilongoshi na mweni, ila Petili, Yakobi na Yohani, mlongu waki Yakobi.
Pavafikili kaya kwa Yailu mkomi wa nyumba ya kudadavila, Yesu kawona ndilingu na papikanishili vandu vakulila na kudadava.
Yesu kayingila munyumba, kavawombela “Wuli mkugola ndilingu na kulila? Mwana kasova ng'odu, kawonja hela!”
Lakini veni vamseka, topi, kavafumisha vosi panji. Kavatola tati na mau wa mwana yula, pamu na vanachuli vaki vatatu vavelili nawu, vayingila muchumbagati chivamuwonjishili mwana yula.
Yesu katola liwoku, kamuwombela, “Talita koumu!” Mana yaki, “Muhinja, ngukuwombela tandamuki!”
Bahala pala muhinja yula kayimuka na kakanda kuyendayenda. Muhinja yula aveli na myaka lilongu limu na mivili. Pafibwitukili afi, vandu vajinga nendu.
Lakini Yesu kavakana nendu vakotoo kumuwombela mundu yoyosi chilongu achi chigolikili. Pambeli Yesu kavawombela “Mumgayili muhinja ayu filivi.”
Yesu kawuka pala, kayenda mumbwani yaki, vandundami vaki vamkovikela.
Palifikili lijuva lya kupumulila, kakanda kuwula munyumba ya kudadavila. Vandu vatangalili vampikanishili vajinga, vadasha, “Kafipata koti fyosi afi? Luhunja liki alu kagayiliwa? Wuliwuli akuwesha kugola mihilu ayi?
Ayu msongola findu ng'odu? Mwana wa Maliya na valongu vaki vakina Yakobi, Yose, Yuda na Simoni? Na vahaja vaki vakwikala bahapa ng'odu?” Topi, vamlema.
Yesu kavawombela, “Mbuyi akupikanishwa mahali posi, ila akupikanishwa ha mumbwani yaki na kwa valongu vaki na kaya yaki.”
Yesu kawesha ha kugola mihilu yoyosi pala, kavavikila vatami vadokwa hela mawoku, kavalowola.
Kajinga nendu kwanongwa vandu vavahela ujumilwa. Pambeli Yesu kafityangila fijiji fya pabehi, pavawula vandu.
Kavakema vala vanachuli lilongu na vavili, kakanda kuvalayisha vavili vavili. Kavagayila uwesu wa kuvawusha finyamkela.
Pambeli kavawombela, “Mkotoo kutola chindu chochosi mumwanja, ila lukweku weka hela. Mkotoo kutola filivi, wala muhaku, wala mbiya muchiwunu.
Mfwali filatu, lakini mukotoo kutola yingwa yimonga.
Nyumba yoyosi yivavalibushila, mwikali mula mbaka pamuwuka mbwani ayi.
Na mahali poposi vandu pavalema kuvalibushila ama kuvapikanisha, muwuki mupundi lifu mumawulu venu. Ayi dayivi utovileli kwa veni.”
Topi vayenda na kuvalandulila vandu vapomeli.
Vavafumisha finyamkela vatangalili na kuvashaya mafuta vatami vatangalili na kuvalowola.
Mutwa Helodi papikanishili filongu afi fyosi, kwanongwa litawa lya Yesu lipikanika mahali posi. Vandu vamonga vadetili, “Yohani mbatisha kashukuka! Ndi nongwa yaveli na liwovi lya kugola mihilu ayi.”
Lakini vamonga vadetili, “Ayu Eliya.” Vamonga vadetili, “Ayu mbuyi, kucha vala vambuyi va dahili.”
Helodi papikanishili filongu afi, kadeta, “Yohani mbatisha yindimdumulili mutwi kashukuka!”
Kwa nongwa dahili Helodi mweni alayishili kucha Yohani mbatisha akamuliwi na awopiwi muchijaka. Agolili naha kwanongwa amuhetili Helodiya, mdala wa Filipu na Filipu avelili mfwata mundu Helodi
Yohani mbatisha amuwombilili Helodi, “Malawu vakulema yuwi kumtola mwehi wa mlongu waku!”
Naha Helodiya kamkalalila nendu Yohani mbatisha, kadayila kumuwulagha, lakini kawesha ha nongwa ya Helodi.
Helodi amtilili Yohani mbatisha kwanongwa amanyili aveli mundu mnofu yang'alili, topi aveli akumlolela. Adayilaya kumpikanisha Yohani mbatisha, mani hela pamupikanishili kala, ajingili nendu.
Lijuva limu Helodiya apatili fwasi mulihungu lya kuwoneka kwa Helodi. Helodi avagolilili lihungu vatavala, vakulu va machonda na filongosi wa mlima wa Galilaya.
Muhinja wa Helodiya payingilili kufina, afinili finofu, Helodi na vahenja vaki vasekilili. Topi mutwa kamuwombela muhinja yula, “Luvi chindu chochosi chiwudayila, nenga dangugayili.”
